trans-unit.source: Returns a character list that represents Term. Option Depth controls the depth of the structures written. When the specified depth is reached, everything below this level is replaced by "...". Depth defaults to -1, which means no limitation. Option CharsLimit puts a soft limit on the number of characters returned. When the number of characters is reached, remaining structures are replaced by "...". CharsLimit defaults to -1, which means no limit on the number of characters returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 Term 的字符列表。选项 Depth 控制写入的结构的深度。当达到指定深度时，此级别以下的所有内容均由“ ... ” 代替。 Depth 默认为-1，表示没有限制。选项 CharsLimit 对返回的字符数设置了软限制。当达到字符数时，其余结构将替换为“ ... ”。 CharsLimit 默认为-1，这意味着返回的字符数没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns a character list that represents a new line character.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表新行字符的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a complete list of keys, in any order, which resides within Map.
trans-unit.target: 以任意顺序返回位于 Map 内的键的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a complete list of values, in arbitrary order, contained in map Map.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的完整列表，以任意顺序，包含的地图 Map 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of List1 where the first element matching Elem is deleted, if there is such an element.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List1 的副本，其中删除了与 Elem 匹配的第一个元素（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of TupleList1 where the first occurrence of a T tuple whose Nth element compares equal to Key is replaced with NewTuple, if there is such a tuple T.
trans-unit.target: 返回 TupleList1 的副本，如果存在 T 个元组T，则该元组的第 N 个元素与 Key 相比较的 T 元组的第一个匹配项将被 NewTuple 替换。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of TupleList1 where the first occurrence of a tuple T whose Nth element compares equal to Key is replaced with NewTuple, if there is such a tuple T. If there is no such tuple T, a copy of TupleList1 where [NewTuple] has been appended to the end is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 TupleList1 的副本，如果存在这样的元组 T ，则将第 N 个元素与 Key 相比较的元组 T 的第一次出现替换为 NewTuple 。如果没有这样的元组 T ，则返回 NewTuple 的副本，该副本的 TupleList1 附加了[ NewTuple ]。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of TupleList1 where the first occurrence of a tuple whose Nth element compares equal to Key is deleted, if there is such a tuple.
trans-unit.target: 返回 TupleList1 的副本，如果存在该元组，则删除第一个出现的元组，该元组的第 N 个元素与 Key 相比较。

trans-unit.source: Returns a descriptive string in English of an error tuple returned by yecc:file/1,2. This function is mainly used by the compiler invoking Yecc.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 yecc:file/1,2 返回的错误元组的英语描述性字符串。该函数主要由调用Yecc的编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a descriptive string in English of an error tuple returned by some of the functions of the qlc module or the parse transform. This function is mainly used by the compiler invoking the parse transform.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 qlc 模块或parse转换的某些函数返回的错误元组的英语描述性字符串。该函数主要由编译器调用解析转换使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a diagnostic error string. For possible POSIX values and corresponding strings, see section POSIX Error Codes.
trans-unit.target: 返回诊断错误字符串。有关可能的POSIX值和相应的字符串，请参见 POSIX Error Codes 部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns a flattened version of DeepList with tail Tail appended.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有尾部 Tail 的 DeepList 的展平版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a flattened version of DeepList.
trans-unit.target: 返回 DeepList 的展平版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a float by converting Number to a float, for example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将 Number 转换为浮点数来返回浮点数，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a function, the domain of which is Set1. The value of an element of the domain is the result of applying SetFun to the element.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个函数，其域为 Set1 。域元素的值是对元素应用 SetFun 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a integer variable name higher than any other integer variable name in the syntax tree. An exception is thrown if Tree does not represent a well-formed Core Erlang syntax tree.
Returns a key-value list with information about the daemon.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含守护进程信息的键值列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a key-value list, where the keys are the different types of algorithms and the values are the algorithms themselves.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个键值列表,其中键是不同类型的算法,值是算法本身。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list (a dictionary) containing information about the agent. Information includes loaded MIBs, registered sub-agents, some information about the memory allocation.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含代理信息的列表(一个字典)。信息包括加载的MIB、注册的子代理、内存分配的一些信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list (a dictionary) containing information about the manager. Information includes statistics counters, miscellaneous info about each process (e.g. memory allocation), and so on.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含管理器信息的列表(一个字典)。信息包括统计计数器、每个进程的杂项信息(如内存分配)等。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing InfoTuples with miscellaneous information about the process identified by Pid, or undefined if the process is not alive.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含列表 InfoTuple s的有关鉴定过程的各种信息 Pid ，或 undefined 如果进程不活。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing N copies of term Elem.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含 N 个术语 Elem 的副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing information about the global groups. Each list element is a tuple. The order of the tuples is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含全局组信息的列表。每个列表元素是一个元组。元组的顺序没有定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing information about the source of OS monotonic time that is used by the runtime system.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关运行时系统使用的 OS monotonic time 源的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing information about the source of OS system time that is used by the runtime system.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关运行时系统使用的 OS system time 源的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing miscellaneous information about the emulators internal I/O checking. Notice that the content of the returned list can vary between platforms and over time. It is only guaranteed that a list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含仿真器内部I/O检查的杂项信息的列表。请注意,返回的列表的内容可能会随着平台和时间的不同而变化。只保证返回一个列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing some information about a BEAM file as tuples {Item, Info}:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关BEAM文件的一些信息，作为元组 {Item, Info} ：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the {Item, Value} tuples for all other items, or returns false if no tracing is active for this function.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有其他项目的 {Item, Value} 元组的列表，如果此函数没有活动的跟踪，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of List1 where all except the first element of the elements comparing equal according to the ordering functionFun have been deleted. Fun(A, B) is to return true if A compares less than or equal to B in the ordering, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含 List1 排序元素的列表，其中删除了除根据 ordering function Fun 相等的元素的第一个元素以外的所有元素。如果 A 在排序中小于或等于 B ，则 Fun(A, B) 返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of List1 where all except the first element of the elements comparing equal have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含 List1 排序后的元素的列表，其中除第一个相等的元素之外的所有元素均已删除。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of List1, according to the ordering functionFun. Fun(A, B) is to return true if A compares less than or equal to B in the ordering, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 根据 ordering function Fun 返回一个包含 List1 排序元素的列表。如果 A 在排序中小于或等于 B ，则 Fun(A, B) 返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of List1.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 List1 的排序元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of list TupleList1 where all except the first tuple of the tuples comparing equal have been deleted. Sorting is performed on the Nth element of the tuples.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含列表 TupleList1 的已排序元素的列表，其中除相等的元组的第一个元组之外的所有元组都已删除。对元组的第 N 个元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing the sorted elements of list TupleList1. Sorting is performed on the Nth element of the tuples. The sort is stable.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含列表 TupleList1 的排序元素的列表。对元组的第 N 个元素进行排序。排序是稳定的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing tuples with information about Port, or undefined if the port is not open. The order of the tuples is undefined, and all the tuples are not mandatory. If the port is closed and the calling process was previously linked to the port, the exit signal from the port is guaranteed to be delivered before port_info/1 returns undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含元组的列表，其中元组包含有关 Port 的信息；如果端口未打开，则返回 undefined 。元组的顺序是不确定的，并且所有元组不是强制性的。如果端口是关闭的，并且调用过程先前已链接到该端口，则可以保证在 port_info/1 返回 undefined 之前传递来自该端口的退出信号。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list corresponding to Tuple. Tuple can contain any Erlang terms. Example:
trans-unit.target: 返回对应于 Tuple 的列表。 Tuple 可以包含任何Erlang术语。例：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list corresponding to the specified format string, where control sequences have been replaced with corresponding tuples. This list can be passed to:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与指定格式字符串相对应的列表,其中控制序列已被相应的元组所取代。这个列表可以传递给

trans-unit.source: Returns a list describing the default garbage collection settings. A process spawned on the local node by a spawn or spawn_link uses these garbage collection settings. The default settings can be changed by using erlang:system_flag/2. spawn_opt/2,3,4 can spawn a process that does not use the default settings.

Returns a list describing the default garbage collection settings. A process spawned on the local node by a spawn or spawn_link uses these garbage collection settings. The default settings can be changed by using erlang:system_flag/2. spawn_opt/2,3,4 can spawn a process that does not use the default settings.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述默认垃圾收集设置的列表。由 spawn 或 spawn_link 在本地节点上生成的进程使用这些垃圾收集设置。可以使用 erlang:system_flag/2 更改默认设置。 spawn_opt/2,3,4 可以生成不使用默认设置的进程。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list in which all the sublists of ListOfLists have been appended.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中 ListOfLists 的所有子列表均已附加。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of 2-tuples containing interface names and the interface addresses. Ifname is a Unicode string. Hwaddr is hardware dependent, for example, on Ethernet interfaces it is the 6-byte Ethernet address (MAC address (EUI-48 address)).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含接口名称和接口地址的2元组列表。 Ifname 是Unicode字符串。 Hwaddr 取决于硬件，例如，在以太网接口上，它是6字节的以太网地址（MAC地址（EUI-48地址））。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of 2-tuples containing interface names and the interfaces' addresses. Ifname is a Unicode string and Ifopts is a list of interface address description tuples.

Returns a list of connected components.. Each component is represented by its vertices. The order of the vertices and the order of the components are arbitrary. Each vertex of digraph Digraph occurs in exactly one component.
trans-unit.target: 返回已 connected components. 的列表。。每个分量均由其顶点表示。顶点的顺序和分量的顺序是任意的。有向 Digraph 每个顶点有向图恰好在一个分量中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of strongly connected components. Each strongly component is represented by its vertices. The order of the vertices and the order of the components are arbitrary. Each vertex of digraph Digraph occurs in exactly one strong component.
trans-unit.target: 返回 strongly connected components 的列表。每个强分量均由其顶点表示。顶点的顺序和分量的顺序是任意的。有向 Digraph 每个顶点有向图都恰好在一个强成分中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of strongly connected components. Each strongly component is represented by its vertices. The order of the vertices and the order of the components are arbitrary. Only vertices that are included in some cycle in Digraph are returned, otherwise the returned list is equal to that returned by strong_components/1.

Returns a list of strongly connected components. Each strongly component is represented by its vertices. The order of the vertices and the order of the components are arbitrary. Only vertices that are included in some cycle in Digraph are returned, otherwise the returned list is equal to that returned by strong_components/1.
trans-unit.target: 返回 strongly connected components 的列表。每个强分量均由其顶点表示。顶点的顺序和分量的顺序是任意的。只有那些包括在一些顶点 cycle 中 Digraph 返回，否则返回列表等于由归国 strong_components/1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of undefined functions.
trans-unit.target: 返回 undefined functions 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Pids when multi-scheduling is blocked, otherwise the empty list is returned. The Pids in the list represent all the processes currently blocking multi-scheduling. A Pid occurs only once in the list, even if the corresponding process has blocked multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 阻止多调度时，返回 Pid 的列表，否则返回空列表。列表中的 Pid 代表当前阻止多调度的所有进程。甲 Pid 只发生一次在列表中，即使相应的过程已阻止多次。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Pids when normal multi-scheduling is blocked (that is, all normal schedulers but one is blocked), otherwise the empty list is returned. The Pids in the list represent all the processes currently blocking normal multi-scheduling. A Pid occurs only once in the list, even if the corresponding process has blocked multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 阻止常规多重调度（即，所有常规调度程序但一个被阻止）时，返回 Pid 的列表，否则返回空列表。列表中的 Pid 代表当前阻止常规多调度的所有进程。甲 Pid 只发生一次在列表中，即使相应的过程已阻止多次。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {AttributeName,ValueList} tuples, where AttributeName is the name of an attribute, and ValueList is a list of values. Notice that a given attribute can occur more than once in the list with different values if the attribute occurs more than once in the module.
trans-unit.target: 返回 {AttributeName,ValueList} 元组的列表，其中 AttributeName 是属性的名称，而 ValueList 是值的列表。请注意，如果给定的属性在模块中出现的次数超过一次，则该属性可以在列表中以不同的值出现多次。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {Name,Arity} tuples with all NIF functions in the module.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含该模块中所有NIF函数的 {Name,Arity} 元组的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {Name,Arity} tuples with all exported functions in the module.
trans-unit.target: 返回 {Name,Arity} 元组的列表，其中包含模块中所有导出的函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {Name,Arity} tuples with all functions in the module.
trans-unit.target: 返回 {Name,Arity} 元组的列表，其中包含模块中的所有函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {Tag, Value} pairs describing digraph G. The following pairs are returned:
trans-unit.target: 返回描述图 G 的 {Tag, Value} 对的列表。返回以下对：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of {Tag, Value} pairs describing the log. If a disk log process is running on the current node, that log is used as source of information, otherwise an individual distributed log on some other node is chosen, if such a log exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述日志的 {Tag, Value} 对的列表。如果当前节点上正在运行磁盘日志进程，则将该日志用作信息源，否则，如果存在其他日志，则选择某个其他节点上的单个分布式日志。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of Erlang modules that are preloaded in the system. As all loading of code is done through the file system, the file system must have been loaded previously. Hence, at least the module init must be preloaded.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中预装的Erlang模块的列表。由于所有代码加载都是通过文件系统完成的，因此文件系统必须事先已加载。因此，至少必须 init 模块init。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all in-neighbors of V of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 以未指定的顺序返回图 G 的 V 的所有 in-neighbors 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all out-neighbors of V of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 以未指定的顺序返回图 G 的 V 的所有 out-neighbors 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all IP addresses for Host. Host can be an IP address, a single hostname, or a fully qualified hostname.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Host 的所有IP地址的列表。 Host 可以是IP地址，单个主机名或标准主机名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all active alarms. This function can only be used when the simple handler is installed.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有活动警报的列表。该函数只能在安装了简单处理程序时使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all address/port number pairs for the other end of an association Assoc of a socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字关联 Assoc 的另一端的所有地址/端口号对的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all edges emanating from V of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 返回未指定顺序从图 G 的 V emanating 的所有边的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all edges emanating from or incident onV of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 返回从图 G 的 V emanating 或 incident 到图G的V的所有边的列表，并且未指定顺序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all edges incident on V of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有的名单边缘 incident 的 V 有向图的 G ，在一些未指定的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all edges of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 以未指定的顺序返回有向图 G 的所有边的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all environment variables. Each environment variable is expressed as a single string on the format "VarName=Value", where VarName is the name of the variable and Value its value.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有环境变量的列表。每个环境变量都以 "VarName=Value" 格式表示为单个字符串，其中 VarName 是变量的名称，而 Value 是其值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all event handlers installed in event manager EventMgrRef.
trans-unit.target: 返回安装在事件管理器 EventMgrRef 中的所有事件处理程序的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all files that match Unix-style wildcard string Wildcard.
trans-unit.target: 返回与Unix样式的通配符字符串 Wildcard 匹配的所有文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all globally registered names.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有全球注册名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all keys in a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字典中所有键的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all keys in dictionary Dict.
trans-unit.target: 返回字典 Dict 中所有键的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all keys in the table named Tab. The semantics of this function is context-sensitive. For more information, see mnesia:activity/4. In transaction-context, it acquires a read lock on the entire table.
trans-unit.target: 返回名为 Tab 的表中所有键的列表。该函数的语义是上下文相关的。有关更多信息，请参见 mnesia:activity/4 。在事务上下文中，它获取整个表的读取锁。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all keys present in the process dictionary, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回进程字典中所有键的列表,例如。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all known groups.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已知组的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all loaded Erlang modules (current and old code), including preloaded modules.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已加载的Erlang模块(当前的和旧的代码)的列表,包括预加载的模块。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all local address/port number pairs for a socket for the specified association Assoc.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定关联 Assoc 的套接字的所有本地地址/端口号对的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all names that are globally registered on the specified node or in the specified global group.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定节点或指定全局组中全局注册的所有名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all objects in table Tab.
trans-unit.target: 返回表 Tab 中所有对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all objects of table Name that match Pattern in some unspecified order. For a description of patterns, see ets:match/2.
trans-unit.target: 返回表 Name 中所有与 Pattern （未指定顺序）匹配的所有对象的列表。有关模式的描述，请参见 ets:match/2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all objects with key Key in table Tab.
trans-unit.target: 返回表 Tab 中具有键 Key 的所有对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all objects with key Key stored in table Name, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回与密钥的所有对象的列表 Key 存储在表 Name ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all ports on the current node.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前节点上所有端口的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all possible engine methods.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有可能的引擎方法的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all processes having monitors for loading active. Each process is returned as {pid(),integer() >= 0}, where integer() is the number of monitors held by process pid().
trans-unit.target: 返回所有具有活动 loading 监视器的进程的列表。每个进程都以 {pid(),integer() >= 0} ，其中 integer() 是进程 pid() 持有的监视器数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all processes having monitors for unloading active. Each process is returned as {pid(),integer() >= 0}, where integer() is the number of monitors held by process pid().
trans-unit.target: 返回所有具有活动 unloading 监视器的进程的列表。每个进程都以 {pid(),integer() >= 0} ，其中 integer() 是进程 pid() 持有的监视器数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all sockets, according to the filter rule.

Returns a list of all successful set requests performed in the test case in reverse order. The list contains the involved user and agent, the value before set, and the new value. This is intended to simplify the cleanup in function end_per_testcase, that is, the undoing of the set requests and their possible side-effects.
trans-unit.target: 以相反的顺序返回在测试用例中执行的所有成功 set 请求的列表。该列表包含所涉及的用户和代理， set 之前的值以及新值。这旨在简化函数 end_per_testcase 中的清除，即撤消 set 请求及其可能的副作用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all tables at the node. Named tables are specified by their names, unnamed tables are specified by their table identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点上所有表的列表。已命名的表由其名称指定,未命名的表由其表标识符指定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all test cases and groups in the suite. (Mandatory)
trans-unit.target: 返回套件中所有测试用例和组的列表。(必须填写)

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the available drivers, both (statically) linked-in and dynamically loaded ones.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有可用的驱动程序的列表,包括(静态)链接的和动态加载的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all vertices of Digraph that are included in some loop.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含在某个 loop 的 Digraph 所有顶点的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all vertices of digraph G, in some unspecified order.
trans-unit.target: 以未指定的顺序返回图 G 的所有顶点的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all visible nodes in the system, except the local node. Same as nodes(visible).
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中除本地节点外的所有可见节点的列表。与 nodes(visible) 相同（可见）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all visible nodes this node is connected to.
trans-unit.target: 返回此节点所连接的所有可见节点的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of applications called by some of the given applications.
trans-unit.target: 返回由一些给定应用程序调用的应用程序列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of applications that use some of the given applications.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用一些给定应用程序的应用程序列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of atoms indicating what kind of traces is enabled for the process. The list is empty if no traces are enabled, and one or more of the followings atoms if traces are enabled: send, 'receive', set_on_spawn, call, return_to, procs, ports, set_on_first_spawn, set_on_link, running, running_procs, running_ports, silent, exiting, monotonic_timestamp, strict_monotonic_timestamp, garbage_collection, timestamp, and arity. The order is arbitrary.
trans-unit.target: 返回原子列表，该原子列表指示为该过程启用了哪种跟踪。如果未启用跟踪，则列表为空；如果启用跟踪，则列表中的一个或多个以下原子： send ， 'receive' ， set_on_spawn ， call ， return_to ， procs ， ports ， set_on_first_spawn ， set_on_link ， running ， running_procs ， running_ports ， silent ， exiting ， monotonic_timestamp ， strict_monotonic_timestamp ， garbage_collection ， timestamp 和 arity 。顺序是任意的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of available service names.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用服务名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of calls to undefined functions.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 undefined functions 的调用列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of characters that represents Term, but breaks representations longer than one line into many lines and indents each line sensibly. Also tries to detect and output lists of printable characters as strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 Term 的字符列表，但将长于一行的表示形式分成多行，并明智地缩进每行。还尝试检测并输出可打印字符列表作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of currently running services where each service is described by an [{Option, Value}] list. The information in the list is specific for each service and each service has probably its own info function that gives more details about the service.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前正在运行的服务的列表，其中每个服务由 [{Option, Value}] 列表描述。列表中的信息特定于每个服务，每个服务可能都有自己的信息功能，该功能提供有关服务的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of currently running services.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前正在运行的服务列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of exported functions that have not been externally used.
trans-unit.target: 返回未被外部使用的导出函数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of external calls to deprecated functions.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 deprecated functions 的外部调用列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of external calls to deprecated functions. If DeprFlag is equal to next_version, calls to functions to be removed in next version are returned. If DeprFlag is equal to next_major_release, calls to functions to be removed in next major release are returned as well as calls to functions to be removed in next version. Finally, if DeprFlag is equal to eventually, all calls to functions to be removed are returned, including calls to functions to be removed in next version or next major release.
trans-unit.target: 返回对不推荐使用的函数的外部调用的列表。如果 DeprFlag 等于 next_version ，在接下来的版本中删除对函数的调用返回。如果 DeprFlag 等于 next_major_release ，则返回在下一个主要版本中要删除的函数的调用，以及在下一个版本中要删除的函数的调用。最后，如果 DeprFlag 等于 eventually ，要删除到函数的调用返回，其中包括呼吁在下一版本或下一个主要版本中删除的功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of externally used deprecated functions.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of externally used deprecated functions.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of externally used deprecated functions. If DeprFlag is equal to next_version, functions to be removed in next version are returned. If DeprFlag is equal to next_major_release, functions to be removed in next major release are returned as well as functions to be removed in next version. Finally, if DeprFlag is equal to eventually, all functions to be removed are returned, including functions to be removed in next version or next major release.
trans-unit.target: 返回外部不推荐使用的函数的列表。如果 DeprFlag 等于 next_version ，在下一版本中删除的功能被返回。如果 DeprFlag 等于 next_major_release ，则返回要在下一个主要版本中删除的功能，以及要在下一个版本中删除的功能。最后，如果 DeprFlag 等于 eventually ，要删除所有的功能都恢复，包括在下一版本或下一个主要版本中删除的功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of files in long format.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长格式的文件列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of files in short format.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个短格式的文件列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of functions called by some of the given functions.
trans-unit.target: 返回由一些给定函数调用的函数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of functions that use some of the given functions.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用一些给定函数的函数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of indexed positions, a list of positive integers.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个索引位置的列表,一个正整数的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of integers corresponding to the bytes of Binary.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Binary 的字节对应的整数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of integers corresponding to the bytes of Bitstring. If the number of bits in the binary is not divisible by 8, the last element of the list is a bitstring containing the remaining 1-7 bits.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Bitstring 的字节对应的整数列表。如果二进制文件中的位数不能被8整除，则列表的最后一个元素是包含其余1-7位的位串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of integers in the range 0..255, or a binary, depending on the port driver. The meaning of the returned data also depends on the port driver.
trans-unit.target: 返回范围为 0...255 的整数列表,或二进制数据,取决于 port 驱动程序。返回数据的含义也取决于 port 驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of integers representing valid heap sizes in words. All Erlang heaps are sized from sizes in this list.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数列表,用字表示有效的堆大小。所有Erlang堆的大小都是根据这个列表中的大小来确定的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of keys that are associated with the value Val in the process dictionary, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回与过程字典中的 Val 值相关联的键的列表，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of lexemes in String, separated by the grapheme clusters in SeparatorList.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的词素的列表，由 SeparatorList 中的字素簇分隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of local functions that have not been locally used.
trans-unit.target: 返回未被本地使用的本地函数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of microstate statistics values where the values for all threads of the same type has been merged.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个微状态统计值的列表,其中所有同类型线程的值已被合并。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of modules called by some of the given modules.
trans-unit.target: 返回由一些给定模块调用的模块列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of modules that use some of the given modules.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用给定模块的模块列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of names that have been registered using register/2, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回已使用 register/2 注册的名称的列表，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of names that have been registered using register/2.
trans-unit.target: 返回已使用 register/2 注册的名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of nodes according to the argument specified. The returned result, when the argument is a list, is the list of nodes satisfying the disjunction(s) of the list elements.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的参数返回一个节点列表,当参数是一个列表时,返回的结果是满足列表元素异构的节点列表。当参数是一个列表时,返回的结果是满足列表元素异结的节点列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of objects stored in a table. The exact representation of the returned objects is not public. The lists of data can be used for initializing a table by specifying value bchunk to option format of function init_table/3 The Mnesia application uses this function for copying open tables.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在表中的对象列表。返回对象的确切表示形式不是公开的。通过将值 bchunk 指定为函数 init_table/3 的选项 format ，可以将数据列表用于初始化表Mnesia应用程序使用此函数复制打开的表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of pairs representing the key-value associations of Map, where the pairs [{K1,V1}, ..., {Kn,Vn}] are returned in arbitrary order.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 Map 的键-值关联的对列表，其中对 [{K1,V1}, ..., {Kn,Vn}] 对以任意顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of port identifiers corresponding to all the ports existing on the local node.
trans-unit.target: 返回与本地节点上现有的所有端口对应的端口标识符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of process identifiers corresponding to all the processes currently existing on the local node.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点上当前存在的所有进程对应的进程标识符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of public keys and their related attributes. Each pair of key and attribute corresponds to one entry in the authorized key file:
trans-unit.target: 返回公钥及其相关属性的列表。每一对密钥和属性对应于授权密钥文件中的一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of public keys and their related attributes. Each pair of key and attribute corresponds to one entry in the known hosts file:
trans-unit.target: 返回公钥及其相关属性的列表。每一对密钥和属性对应于已知主机文件中的一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of raw lock counter data.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个原始锁计数器数据的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of releases called by some of the given releases.
trans-unit.target: 返回由一些给定版本调用的版本列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of releases that use some of the given releases.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用了一些给定发布版本的发布列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of subkeys to the current key. Calls the Win32 API function EnumRegKeysEx().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前键的子键列表。调用Win32 API函数 EnumRegKeysEx() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of supported ECCs. eccs() is equivalent to calling eccs(Protocol) with all supported protocols and then deduplicating the output.
trans-unit.target: 返回支持的ECC列表。 eccs() 等效于使用所有受支持的协议调用 eccs(Protocol) ，然后对输出进行重复数据删除。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the current member nodes of the pool.
trans-unit.target: 返回池中当前成员节点的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the driver options provided when loading, and any options set by the driver during initialization. The only valid option is kill_ports.
trans-unit.target: 返回加载时提供的驱动程序选项的列表，以及驱动程序在初始化期间设置的任何选项。唯一有效的选项是 kill_ports 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the items in the queue in the same order; the front item of the queue becomes the head of the list.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列中按相同顺序排列的项目列表;队列中的前一项成为列表的头。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of all allocators using the ERTS internal alloc_util framework as atoms. For more information, see section The alloc_util framework in erts_alloc(3).
trans-unit.target: 使用ERTS内部 alloc_util 框架作为原子返回所有分配器名称的列表。有关详细信息，请参见 The alloc_util framework 在 erts_alloc(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the names of all open tables on this node.
trans-unit.target: 返回此节点上所有打开的表的名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tokens in String, separated by the characters in SeparatorList.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的标记列表，并用 SeparatorList 中的字符分隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples {DriverName, InfoList}, where InfoList is the result of calling info/1 for that DriverName. Only dynamically linked-in drivers are included in the list.
trans-unit.target: 返回元组 {DriverName, InfoList} 的列表，其中 InfoList 是对该 DriverName 调用 info/1 的结果。列表中仅包含动态链接的驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples {Module, Filename, Loaded} for all available modules. A module is considered to be available if it either is loaded or would be loaded if called. Filename is normally the absolute filename, as described for is_loaded/1.
Returns a list of tuples {Module, Loaded} for all loaded modules. Loaded is normally the absolute filename, as described for is_loaded/1.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有已加载模块的元组列表 {Module, Loaded} 。通常， Loaded 是绝对文件名，如 is_loaded/1 所述。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples {Node, ControllingEntity}, one entry for each connected remote node. Node is the node name and ControllingEntity is the port or process identifier responsible for the communication to that node. More specifically, ControllingEntity for nodes connected through TCP/IP (the normal case) is the socket used in communication with the specific node.
trans-unit.target: 返回元组 {Node, ControllingEntity} 的列表，每个连接的远程节点都有一个条目。 Node 是节点名称， ControllingEntity 是负责与该节点进行通信的端口或进程标识符。更具体地， ControllingEntity 用于通过TCP / IP（正常情况）相连的节点是在通信中使用的与特定节点的插座。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples {Tag, Value}, where Tag is the information item and Value is the result of calling info/2 with this driver name and this tag. The result is a tuple list containing all information available about a driver.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组 {Tag, Value} 的列表，其中 Tag 是信息项，而 Value 是使用该驱动程序名称和该标签调用 info/2 的结果。结果是一个元组列表，其中包含有关驱动程序的所有可用信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples where, for each tuple in TupleList1, the Nth element Term1 of the tuple has been replaced with the result of calling Fun(Term1).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组列表，其中对于 TupleList1 中的每个元组，该元组的第 N 个元素 Term1 已被调用 Fun(Term1) 的结果替换。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples with {SchedulerId, ActiveTime, TotalTime}, where SchedulerId is an integer ID of the scheduler, ActiveTime is the duration the scheduler has been busy, and TotalTime is the total time duration since scheduler_wall_time activation for the specific scheduler. Note that activation time can differ significantly between schedulers. Currently dirty schedulers are activated at system start while normal schedulers are activated some time after the scheduler_wall_time functionality is enabled. The time unit is undefined and can be subject to change between releases, OSs, and system restarts. scheduler_wall_time is only to be used to calculate relative values for scheduler utilization. ActiveTime can never exceed TotalTime.

Returns a list of tuples with {SchedulerId, ActiveTime, TotalTime}, where SchedulerId is an integer ID of the scheduler, ActiveTime is the duration the scheduler has been busy, and TotalTime is the total time duration since scheduler_wall_time activation for the specific scheduler. Note that activation time can differ significantly between schedulers. Currently dirty schedulers are activated at system start while normal schedulers are activated some time after the scheduler_wall_time functionality is enabled. The time unit is undefined and can be subject to change between releases, OSs, and system restarts. scheduler_wall_time is only to be used to calculate relative values for scheduler utilization. ActiveTime can never exceed TotalTime.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有 {SchedulerId, ActiveTime, TotalTime} 的元组列表，其中 SchedulerId 是调度程序的整数ID， ActiveTime 是调度程序忙的持续时间， TotalTime 是自为特定调度 scheduler_wall_time 激活scheduler_wall_time 以来的总时间。请注意，调度程序之间的激活时间可能会有很大差异。在启用 scheduler_wall_time 功能后的一段时间内，当前肮脏的调度程序在系统启动时被激活，而正常调度程序被激活。时间单位是不确定的，可以在发行版，操作系统和系统重新启动之间进行更改。 scheduler_wall_time 仅用于计算调度程序利用率的相对值。 ActiveTime 永远不能超过 TotalTime 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples with information about how the module was compiled. This list is empty if the module has been stripped with the beam_lib(3) module (in STDLIB).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组列表，其中包含有关如何编译模块的信息。如果模块已被 beam_lib(3) 模块剥离（在STDLIB中），则此列表为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuples with information about miscellaneous allocated memory areas.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含杂项分配的内存区域信息的元组列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list where each element represents the amount of active processes and ports on each run queue and its associated schedulers. That is, the number of processes and ports that are ready to run, or are currently running. Values for normal run queues and their associated schedulers are located first in the resulting list. The first element corresponds to scheduler number 1 and so on. If support for dirty schedulers exist, an element with the value for the dirty CPU run queue and its associated dirty CPU schedulers follow and then as last element the value for the the dirty IO run queue and its associated dirty IO schedulers follow. The information is not gathered atomically. That is, the result is not necessarily a consistent snapshot of the state, but instead quite efficiently gathered.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中每个元素代表每个运行队列及其关联的调度程序上的活动进程和端口的数量。即，准备运行或当前正在运行的进程和端口的数量。正常运行队列及其关联的调度程序的值位于结果列表中的第一位。第一个元素对应于调度程序编号1，依此类推。如果存在对脏调度程序的支持，则紧随其后的是具有脏CPU运行队列及其关联的脏CPU调度程序的值的元素，然后作为最后一个元素，是脏IO运行队列及其关联的脏IO调度程序的值。信息不是原子收集的。也就是说，结果不一定是状态的一致快照，而是相当有效地收集的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list where each element represents the amount of processes and ports ready to run for each run queue. Values for normal run queues are located first in the resulting list. The first element corresponds to the normal run queue of scheduler number 1 and so on. If support for dirty schedulers exist, values for the dirty CPU run queue and the dirty IO run queue follow (in that order) at the end. The information is not gathered atomically. That is, the result is not necessarily a consistent snapshot of the state, but instead quite efficiently gathered.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中每个元素代表准备为每个运行队列运行的进程和端口的数量。正常运行队列的值位于结果列表的第一位。第一个元素对应于编号为1的调度程序的正常运行队列，依此类推。如果存在对脏调度程序的支持，最后将以脏CPU运行队列和脏IO运行队列的值（按此顺序）。信息不是原子收集的。也就是说，结果不一定是状态的一致快照，而是相当有效地收集的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list whose elements are the path components of Filename.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其元素是 Filename 的路径组成部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with all imported files.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有导入文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with all interpreted modules.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所有解释模块的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with all modules for which there are imported data.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含有导入数据的所有模块的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with all modules that are currently Cover compiled.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含当前所有Cover编译的模块的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with all nodes that are part of the coverage analysis. Note that the current node is not returned. This node is always part of the analysis.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含所有属于覆盖分析的节点的列表。请注意,当前节点不会被返回。该节点始终是分析的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with information about memory dynamically allocated by the Erlang emulator. Each list element is a tuple {Type, Size}. The first element Type is an atom describing memory type. The second element Size is the memory size in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关由Erlang仿真器动态分配的内存的信息。每个列表元素都是一个元组 {Type, Size} 。第一个元素 Type 是描述内存类型的原子。第二个元素 Size 是内存大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with information about the applications that are currently running. Application is the application name. Description and Vsn are the values of their description and vsn application specification keys, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关当前正在运行的应用程序的信息。 Application 是应用程序名称。 Description 和 Vsn 分别是其 description 和 vsn 应用程序规范键的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with information about the applications, and included applications, which are loaded using load/1,2. Application is the application name. Description and Vsn are the values of their description and vsn application specification keys, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关使用 load/1,2 加载的应用程序和包含的应用程序的信息。 Application 是应用程序名称。 Description 和 Vsn 分别是其 description 和 vsn 应用程序规范键的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with information about the fun Fun. Each list element is a tuple. The order of the tuples is undefined, and more tuples can be added in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含有关 Fun 的信息。每个列表元素都是一个元组。元组的顺序是不确定的，将来的版本中可以添加更多的元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with the elements in List1 in reverse order, with tail Tail appended.
trans-unit.target: 以相反的顺序返回列表，列表中包含 List1 中的元素，并附加尾巴 Tail 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with the elements in List1 in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 以相反的顺序返回列表，其中 List1 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with values for all columns in Cols. If a column is undefined, its value is noinit.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有 Cols 中所有列的值的列表。如果未定义列，则其值为 noinit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a map Map for which predicate Pred holds true in MapOrIter.
trans-unit.target: 返回谓词 Pred 在 MapOrIter 中为true的地图 Map 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a map iterator Iterator that can be used by maps:next/1 to traverse the key-value associations in a map. When iterating over a map, the memory usage is guaranteed to be bounded no matter the size of the map.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个映射迭代 Iterator ，该迭代器可被 maps:next/1 使用以遍历映射中的键值关联。在映射上进行迭代时，无论映射的大小如何，都将保证内存使用量是有限的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a negative value if the call failed where the following bits can be set:
trans-unit.target: 如果调用失败,返回一个负值,其中以下位可以设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Erlang term corresponding to the requested element, or NULL if position was greater than the arity of tuple.
trans-unit.target: 返回与请求的元素相对应的新Erlang术语；如果 position 大于 tuple 的arity，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new TLS/DTLS socket if the handshake is successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果握手成功,返回一个新的TLS/DTLS套接字。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new empty map.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的空地图。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new empty ordered set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的空有序集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new empty set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的空集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new empty tree.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的空树。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new list List3 that is a copy of List1, subjected to the following procedure: for each element in List2, its first occurrence in List1 is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新列表 List3 ，它是 List1 的副本，请执行以下过程：对于 List2 中的每个元素，将删除它在 List1 中的第一次出现。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new list List3, which is made from the elements of List1 followed by the elements of List2.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新列表 List3 ，该列表由 List1 的元素和 List2 的元素组成。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new map Map2 with the keys K1 through Kn and their associated values from map Map1. Any key in Ks that does not exist in Map1 is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的地图 Map2 与键 K1 至 Kn 和地图及其相关数值 Map1 。 Map1 中不存在的任何 Ks 键都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new map Map2 without keys K1 through Kn and their associated values from map Map1. Any key in Ks that does not exist in Map1 is ignored
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的地图 Map2 ，无按键 K1 至 Kn 和地图及其相关数值 Map1 。 Map1 中不存在的任何 Ks 键都将被忽略

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ordered set formed from Ordset1 with Element inserted.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 Ordset1 形成并插入 Element 的新的有序集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element inserted.
trans-unit.target: 返回从形成了一套新的 Set1 与 Element 插入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element inserted. Assumes that Element is not present in Set1.
trans-unit.target: 返回从形成了一套新的 Set1 与 Element 插入。假定 Set1 中不存在 Element 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element inserted. If Element is already an element in Set1, nothing is changed.
trans-unit.target: 返回从形成了一套新的 Set1 与 Element 插入。如果 Element 已经是 Set1 中的元素，则什么都不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element removed. Assumes that Element is present in Set1.
trans-unit.target: 返回从 Set1 形成的新集合，其中删除了 Element 。假定 Set1 中存在 Element 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new set formed from Set1 with Element removed. If Element is not an element in Set1, nothing is changed.
trans-unit.target: 返回从 Set1 形成的新集合，其中删除了 Element 。如果 Element 不是 Set1 中的元素，则什么都不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new tuple that has one element more than Tuple1, and contains the elements in Tuple1 followed by Term as the last element. Semantically equivalent to list_to_tuple(tuple_to_list(Tuple1) ++ [Term]), but much faster. Example:

trans-unit.source: Returns a new tuple with element Term inserted at position Index in tuple Tuple1. All elements from position Index and upwards are pushed one step higher in the new tuple Tuple2. Example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的元组，其元素 Term 插入元组 Tuple1 中的位置 Index 。在新的元组 Tuple2 中，从位置 Index 到向上的所有元素都向上推了一步。例：

trans-unit.source: Returns a new tuple with element at Index removed from tuple Tuple1, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的元组，其元素的 Index 从元组 Tuple1 中移除，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created list with information about all child specifications and child processes belonging to supervisor SupRef.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的列表，其中包含有关属于主管 SupRef 的所有子规范和子进程的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created port data lock on success, otherwise NULL. The function fails if port is invalid or if a port data lock already has been associated with the port.
trans-unit.target: 成功返回一个新创建的端口数据锁，否则返回 NULL 。如果 port 无效或端口数据锁已与该 port 关联，则该功能将失败。

trans-unit.source: Returns a non-empty list of some objects stored in a table that match a given pattern in some unspecified order. The table, the pattern, and the number of objects that are matched are all defined by Continuation, which has been returned by a previous call to match_object/1 or match_object/3.
trans-unit.target: 返回表中存储的某些对象的非空列表，这些对象以某种未指定的顺序与给定模式匹配。该表，模式和匹配的对象数均由 Continuation 定义，这是先前调用 match_object/1 或 match_object/3 返回的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a non-negative value on success where the following bits can be set:
trans-unit.target: 成功后返回一个非负值,以下位可以设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a normal N(Mean, Variance) deviate float and updates the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个正态的N(Mean,Variance)偏差浮点数,并更新过程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns a number indicating the number of processes that matched PidPortSpec. If PidPortSpec is a process identifier, the return value is 1. If PidPortSpec is all or existing, the return value is the number of processes running. If PidPortSpec is new, the return value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数字，该数字指示与 PidPortSpec 匹配的进程数。如果 PidPortSpec 是进程标识符，则返回值为 1 。如果 PidPortSpec 是 all 或 existing 的返回值是正在运行的进程数。如果 PidPortSpec 是 new ，则返回值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pair of sets that, regarded as constituting a set, forms a partition of Set1. If the result of applying SetFun to an element of Set1 gives an element in Set2, the element belongs to Set3, otherwise the element belongs to Set4.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对套的是，视为构成一组，形成 partition 的 Set1 。如果将 SetFun 应用于 Set1 的元素的结果给出 Set2 中的元素，则该元素属于 Set3 ，否则该元素属于 Set4 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a performance counter that can be used as a very fast and high resolution timestamp. This counter is read directly from the hardware or operating system with the same guarantees. This means that two consecutive calls to the function are not guaranteed to be monotonic, though it most likely will be. The performance counter will be converted to the resolution passed as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个性能计数器,可以作为一个非常快速和高分辨率的时间戳。这个计数器是直接从硬件或操作系统中读取的,具有相同的保证。这意味着对该函数的两次连续调用并不能保证是单调的,尽管它很可能是单调的。性能计数器将被转换为作为参数传递的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to a dynamically allocated buffer containing a string. If list is not an I/O list, or if list contains the integer 0, NULL is returned. It is the caller's responsibility to free the allocated buffer with erl_free().
trans-unit.target: 返回指向包含字符串的动态分配缓冲区的指针。如果 list 不是I / O列表，或者 list 包含整数0，则返回 NULL 。调用者有责任使用 erl_free() 释放分配的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to a subterm that can be used in a later call to erl_decode() to retrieve the term at that position. If there is no term, or pos would exceed the size of the terms in the buffer, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向子项的指针，该子项可在以后的 erl_decode() 调用中使用，以检索该位置的项。如果没有条件，或者 pos 将超过缓冲区中条件的大小，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the mutex name.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向mutex名称的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the name of the condition.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向条件名称的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the name of the rwlock.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向rwlock名称的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the name of the thread.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向线程名称的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the raw binary data and sets *termp to the binary term.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向原始二进制数据的指针，并将 *termp 设置为二进制项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a port identifier Port as the result of opening a new Erlang port. Messages can be sent to, and received from, a port identifier, just like a pid. Port identifiers can also be linked to using link/1, or registered under a name using register/2.
trans-unit.target: 作为打开新的Erlang端口的结果，返回端口标识符 Port 。可以像pid一样将消息发送到端口标识符或从中接收消息。端口标识符也可以使用 link/1 链接到，或使用 register/2 以名称注册。

trans-unit.source: Returns a port identifier as the result of opening a new Erlang port. A port can be seen as an external Erlang process.
trans-unit.target: 返回打开新的 Erlang port 后的 port 标识符。端口可以看作是一个外部的 Erlang 进程。

trans-unit.source: Returns a port identifier whose text representation is a String, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回端口标识符，其文本表示形式为 String ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a process identifier whose text representation is a String, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个过程标识符，其文本表示形式为 String ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a property list (see proplists) containing the counts for each of the following elements of the supervisor's child specifications and managed processes:
Returns a property list (see proplists) containing the counts for each of the following elements of the supervisor's child specifications and managed processes:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个属性列表（请参阅 proplists ），其中包含主管的子规范和托管流程的以下每个元素的计数：

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle for a QLC table. In Erlang/OTP there is support for ETS, Dets, and Mnesia tables, but many other data structures can be turned into QLC tables. This is accomplished by letting function(s) in the module implementing the data structure create a query handle by calling qlc:table/2. The different ways to traverse the table and properties of the table are handled by callback functions provided as options to qlc:table/2.
trans-unit.target: 返回QLC表的查询句柄。在Erlang / OTP中，支持ETS，Dets和Mnesia表，但是许多其他数据结构可以转换为QLC表。这是通过让实现数据结构的模块中的函数通过调用 qlc:table/2 创建查询句柄来实现的。遍历表和表属性的不同方法由作为 qlc:table/2 选项提供的回调函数处理。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle for a QLC. The QLC must be the first argument to this function, otherwise it is evaluated as an ordinary list comprehension. It is also necessary to add the following line to the source code:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个QLC的查询句柄。QLC必须是这个函数的第一个参数,否则它将作为一个普通的列表理解来计算。还需要在源代码中添加以下一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle. When evaluating query handle QH2, the answers to query handle QH1 are sorted by file_sorter:keysort/4 according to the options.
trans-unit.target: 返回查询句柄。在评估查询句柄 QH2 时，根据选项，通过 file_sorter:keysort/4 对查询句柄 QH1 的答案进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle. When evaluating query handle QH2, the answers to query handle QH1 are sorted by file_sorter:sort/3 according to the options.
trans-unit.target: 返回查询句柄。在评估查询句柄 QH2 时，根据选项，通过 file_sorter:sort/3 对查询句柄 QH1 的答案进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle. When evaluating query handle QH3, all answers to QH1 are returned, followed by all answers to QH2.
trans-unit.target: 返回查询句柄。评估查询句柄 QH3 时，将返回对 QH1 的所有答案，然后返回对 QH2 的所有答案。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query handle. When evaluating query handle QH, all answers to the first query handle in QHL are returned, followed by all answers to the remaining query handles in QHL.
trans-unit.target: 返回查询句柄。当评估查询处理 QH ，所有的答案，第一个查询手柄 QHL 返回，然后是所有的答案中的其余查询手柄 QHL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 containing the items of Q1 in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 以相反的顺序返回包含 Q1 项的队列 Q2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 that is the result of calling Fun(Item) on all items in Q1, in order from front to rear.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个队列 Q2 ，该队列是对 Q1 中的所有项目按从前到后的顺序调用 Fun(Item) 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 that is the result of removing the front item from Q1.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q2 ，该队列是从 Q1 中删除前一项的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 that is the result of removing the head item from Q1.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q2 ，该队列是从 Q1 删除标题项的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 that is the result of removing the rear item from Q1.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q2 ，该队列是从 Q1 中删除后一项的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q2 that is the result of removing the tail item from Q1.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q2 ，该队列是从 Q1 删除尾项的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue Q3 that is the result of joining Q1 and Q2 with Q1 in front of Q2.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q3 ，该队列是将 Q1 和 Q2 与 Q2 前面的 Q1 连接在一起的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a queue containing the items in L in the same order; the head item of the list becomes the front item of the queue.
trans-unit.target: 以相同的顺序返回包含 L 中的项目的队列；列表的首项成为队列的首项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random float uniformly distributed between 0.0 and 1.0, updating the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 0.0 和 1.0 之间均匀分布的随机浮点数，从而更新过程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random float uniformly distributed in the value range 0.0 =< X < 1.0 and updates the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 0.0 =< X < 1.0 范围内均匀分布的随机浮点数，并更新过程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns a random float uniformly distributed in the value range DBL_MIN =< X < 1.0 and updates the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回在值范围 DBL_MIN =< X < 1.0 均匀分布的随机浮点，并更新过程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference whose text representation is a String, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回其文本表示形式为 String 的引用，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a representation of the attributes associated with a syntax tree node. The attributes are all the extra information that can be attached to a node. Currently, this includes position information, source code comments, and user annotations. The result of this function cannot be inspected directly; only attached to another node (see set_attrs/2).
trans-unit.target: 返回与语法树节点关联的属性的表示形式。这些属性是可以附加到节点的所有其他信息。当前，这包括位置信息，源代码注释和用户注释。此功能的结果无法直接检查；仅附加到另一个节点（请参阅 set_attrs/2 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a runtime system independent version of the microstate statistics data presented by erlang:statistics(microstate_accounting). All counters have been normalized to be in microsecond resolution.

Returns a runtime system independent version of the microstate statistics data presented by erlang:statistics(microstate_accounting). All counters have been normalized to be in microsecond resolution.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 erlang:statistics(microstate_accounting) 表示的微状态统计数据的运行时系统独立版本。所有计数器均已标准化为微秒分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of integers that starts with From and contains the successive results of adding Incr to the previous element, until To is reached or passed (in the latter case, To is not an element of the sequence). Incr defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个以 From 开头的整数序列，该整数序列包含将 Incr 添加到前一个元素的连续结果，直到达到或传递 To （在后一种情况下， To 不是序列的元素）。 Incr 默认为1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set containing only element Element.
trans-unit.target: 返回仅包含元素 Element 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of the elements in List, where List can be unordered and contain duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中的一组元素，其中 List 可以是无序的并且包含重复项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of the elements in List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中的一组元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sorted lists of the names of the variables of an Xref server. The default is to return the user variables only.
trans-unit.target: 返回外部 Xref server 变量名称的排序列表。默认为仅返回 user variables 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a standard normal deviate float (that is, the mean is 0 and the standard deviation is 1) and updates the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标准正态偏差浮点数(即平均值为0,标准偏差为1),并更新过程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string consisting of Number characters Character. Optionally, the string can end with string Tail.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 Number 字符 Character 组成的字符串。可选地，字符串可以以字符串 Tail 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing String repeated Number times.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含 String 重复 Number 次的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the Erlang driver version used by the runtime system. It has the form "<major ver>.<minor ver>".
Returns a string containing the Erlang driver version used by the runtime system. It has the form "<major ver>.<minor ver>".
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含运行时系统使用的Erlang驱动程序版本。它的格式为 "<major ver>.<minor ver>" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the Erlang machine name.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含Erlang机器名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the OTP release number of the OTP release that the currently executing ERTS application is part of.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串,包含当前正在执行的 ERTS 应用程序所属的 OTP 版本号。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the processor and OS architecture the emulator is built for.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串,包含仿真器的处理器和操作系统架构。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the version number of the emulator.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含仿真器版本号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the version of the Erlang NIF interface used by the runtime system. It is on the form "<major ver>.<minor ver>".
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含运行时系统使用的Erlang NIF接口的版本。它的格式为“ <主要版本>。<次要版本>”。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing version number and some important properties, such as the number of schedulers.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含版本号和一些重要属性的字符串,如调度器的数量。

trans-unit.target: 返回与 Atom 的文本表示形式对应的字符串，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a string corresponding to the text representation of Fun.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string corresponding to the text representation of Ref.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Ref 的文本表示形式对应的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string corresponding to the text representation of the port identifier Port.
trans-unit.target: 返回与端口标识符 Port 的文本表示形式对应的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of an encoding. The string is recognized by read_encoding/1,2, read_encoding_from_binary/1,2, and set_encoding/1,2 as a valid encoding.
Returns a string representation of an encoding. The string is recognized by read_encoding/1,2, read_encoding_from_binary/1,2, and set_encoding/1,2 as a valid encoding.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string where any trailing \n or \r\n have been removed from String.
trans-unit.target: 返回已从 String 中删除任何尾随 \n 或 \r\n 字符串。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，该字符串描述当正则表达式中存在错误时返回的错误 ErrorInfo 。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中 StringList 的元素由 Separator 中的字符串分隔。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中 String 以字符串为中心，并用空格或 Character 包围。结果字符串的长度为 Number 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string, where leading or trailing, or both, Characters have been removed. Dir which can be leading, trailing, or both, indicates from which direction characters are to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中删除了前导字符或结尾 Characters ，或同时删除了这两个字符。 Dir 可以是 leading ， trailing 或 both ，指示要从哪个方向删除字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string, where leading or trailing, or both, blanks or a number of Character have been removed. Direction, which can be left, right, or both, indicates from which direction blanks are to be removed. strip/1 is equivalent to strip(String, both).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中前导或尾随或空格和多个 Character 均已删除。 Direction 可以为 left ， right 或 both ，指示要从哪个方向移除毛坯。 strip/1 等效于 strip(String, both) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subset S of the weak relation W corresponding to the binary relation BinRel1. Let F be the field of BinRel1. The subset S is defined so that x S y if x W y for some x in F and for some y in F.
trans-unit.target: 返回的子集S weak relation W¯¯对应的二元关系 BinRel1 。令F 为 BinRel1 的 field 。定义子集S使得对于F中的某些x和F中的某些y如果x W y为x S y。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subset of Set1 containing those elements that do not give an element in Set2 as the result of applying SetFun.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set1 的子集，其中包含那些由于应用 SetFun 而在 Set2 中不提供元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subset of Set1 containing those elements that gives an element in Set2 as the result of applying SetFun.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set1 的子集，其中包含那些元素，这些元素在应用 SetFun 的结果中给出 Set2 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of String of at most Length grapheme clusters, starting at position Start.
trans-unit.target: 从位置 Start 返回最大为 Length 字素簇的 String 的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of String, starting at position Start to the end of the string, or to and including position Stop.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 的子字符串，从子位置 Start 到字符串的末尾，或者直到位置 Stop 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of String, starting at position Start, and ending at the end of the string or at length Length.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 的子字符串，该字符串的起始位置为 Start ，终止于字符串的末尾或长度为 Length 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a suitable regexp string matching common prompts for users on Unix hosts.
trans-unit.target: 返回合适的 regexp 字符串，与Unix主机上用户的常见提示匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns a suitable path, or paths, for a given type. If os is not set in Opts the function will default to the native option, that is 'linux', 'darwin' or 'windows', as understood by os:type/0. Anything not recognized as 'darwin' or 'windows' is interpreted as 'linux'.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定类型的一个或多个合适的路径。如果未在 Opts 中设置 os ,则该功能将默认为本机选项，即 os:type/0 所理解的 'linux' ， 'darwin' 或 'windows' 。任何未被识别为 'darwin' 或 'windows' 的东西都被解释为 'linux' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a summary of all carriers in the system, optionally filtered by allocator type and scheduler id.
trans-unit.target: Returns a summary of all carriers in the system,optionally filtered by allocator type and scheduler ID.

trans-unit.target: Returns a summary of all tagged allocations in the system,optionally filtered by allocator type and scheduler ID.

trans-unit.source: Returns a term from the driver. The meaning of the returned data also depends on the port driver.

trans-unit.source: Returns a term where each collection of annotations Anno of the nodes of the erl_parse tree Abstr is replaced by the term returned by erl_anno:to_term(Anno). The erl_parse tree is traversed in a depth-first, left-to-right fashion.

Returns a term where each collection of annotations Anno of the nodes of the erl_parse tree Abstr is replaced by the term returned by erl_anno:to_term(Anno). The erl_parse tree is traversed in a depth-first, left-to-right fashion.

trans-unit.target: 返回一个三倍的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple {Continuation2, Terms, Badbytes} if the log is opened in read only mode and the read chunk is corrupt. Badbytes indicates the number of non-Erlang terms found in the chunk. Notice that the log is not repaired.
trans-unit.target: 如果以只读模式打开日志并且读取的块已损坏 {Continuation2, Terms, Badbytes} 返回元组{Continuation2，Terms，Badbytes}。 Badbytes 指示在块中找到的非Erlang术语的数量。请注意，该日志未修复。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple {Continuation2, Terms}, where Terms is a list of terms found in the log. Continuation2 is yet another continuation that must be passed on to any subsequent calls to chunk(). With a series of calls to chunk(), it is then possible to extract all terms from a log.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组 {Continuation2, Terms} ，其中“ Terms 是在日志中找到的条款的列表。 Continuation2 是又一个延续，必须继续传递给 chunk() 的任何后续调用。通过对 chunk() 的一系列调用，可以从日志中提取所有项。

trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组 {ok, Value} ，其中 Value 指的是与价值 Key ，或者 error ，如果没有值与相关 Key 在 Map 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a two-tuple describing the C compiler used when compiling the runtime system. The first element is an atom describing the name of the compiler, or undefined if unknown. The second element is a term describing the version of the compiler, or undefined if unknown.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个二元组，描述在编译运行时系统时使用的C编译器。第一个元素是描述编译器名称的原子，如果未知，则为 undefined 。第二个元素是描述编译器版本的术语，如果未知，则 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a type descriptor for a data constructor node. (Cf. is_data/1.) This is mainly useful for comparing types and for constructing new nodes of the same type (cf. make_data/2). If Node represents an integer, floating-point number, atom or empty list, the result is {atomic, Value}, where Value is the value of concrete(Node), otherwise the result is either cons or tuple.
Returns a unique integer with the same properties as specified by erlang:unique_integer/1.
Returns a unique integer with the same properties as specified by erlang:unique_integer/1.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有与 erlang:unique_integer/1 指定的属性相同的唯一整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a user-named atom which is not already in the set Used. The atom is generated by applying the given Function to a generated integer. Integers are generated using an algorithm which tries to keep the names randomly distributed within a reasonably small range relative to the number of elements in the set.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个用户名的原子，该原子不在集合 Used 中。通过将给定的 Function 应用于生成的整数来生成原子。整数是使用一种算法生成的，该算法试图将名称随机分配在相对于集合中元素数量相对较小的范围内。

trans-unit.target: 从具有键 Key 和新 Tree2 的节点返回一个值 Value ，而没有具有该值的节点。假定树中存在带有键的节点，否则崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value Value from node with key Key and new Tree2 without the node with this value. Returns error if the node with the key is not present in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 从具有键 Key 和新 Tree2 的节点返回一个值 Value ，而没有具有该值的节点。如果树中不存在带有密钥的节点，则返回 error 。

trans-unit.target: Returns all default or all supported (except anonymous),or all anonymous cipher suites for a TLS version.

trans-unit.source: Returns all objects in slot I of table Tab. A table can be traversed by repeatedly calling the function, starting with the first slot I=0 and ending when '$end_of_table' is returned. If argument I is out of range, the function fails with reason badarg.
trans-unit.target: 返回表 Tab 的插槽 I 中的所有对象。可以通过重复调用该函数来遍历表，该函数从第一个插槽 I=0 开始，直到返回 '$end_of_table' 为止。如果参数 I 超出范围，则函数失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.target: 返回所有包含特定驱动程序 users 的进程，作为元组列表 {pid(),integer() >= 0} ，其中 integer() 表示进程 pid() 中的用户数。

trans-unit.source: Returns all processes in the group Name. Processes are returned in no specific order. This function is optimised for speed.
Returns all processes in the group Name. This function is to be used from within a client function that accesses the group. It is therefore optimized for speed.
trans-unit.target: 返回组 Name 中的所有进程。此功能将从访问该组的客户端功能中使用。因此，它针对速度进行了优化。

trans-unit.source: Returns all processes running on the local node in the group Name. Processes are returned in no specific order. This function is optimised for speed.

trans-unit.target: 返回在组 Name 的本地节点上运行的所有进程。此功能将从访问该组的客户端功能中使用。因此，它针对速度进行了优化。

trans-unit.target: 返回所有线程在工作上花费的所有时间，即所有未花费在 sleep 状态上的时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns all vertices of digraph Digraph. The order is given by a depth-first traversal of the digraph, collecting visited vertices in postorder. More precisely, the vertices visited while searching from an arbitrarily chosen vertex are collected in postorder, and all those collected vertices are placed before the subsequently visited vertices.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向 Digraph 所有顶点。通过有向图的 depth-first traversal 来给出顺序，以后顺序收集访问的顶点。更准确地说，在从任意选择的顶点进行搜索时访问的顶点将以后置顺序收集，并且所有这些收集的顶点都将放置在随后访问的顶点之前。

trans-unit.source: Returns all vertices of digraph Digraph. The order is given by a depth-first traversal of the digraph, collecting visited vertices in preorder.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向 Digraph 所有顶点。通过有向图的 depth-first traversal 来给出顺序，并按顺序收集访问的顶点。

trans-unit.source: Returns an erl_parse-compatible representation of a syntax tree, if possible. If Tree represents a well-formed Erlang program or expression, the conversion should work without problems. Typically, is_tree/1 yields true if conversion failed (i.e., the result is still an abstract syntax tree), and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，返回语法树的 erl_parse 兼容表示。如果 Tree 表示格式正确的Erlang程序或表达式，则转换应该可以顺利进行。典型地， is_tree/1 产量 true 如果转换失败（即，结果仍然是一个抽象语法树），并 false 否则。

trans-unit.source: Returns an atom describing the build type of the runtime system. This is normally the atom opt for optimized. trans-unit.target: 返回描述运行时系统的构建类型的原子。通常，这是优化的原子 opt 。其他可能的返回值是 debug ， purify ， quantify ， purecov ， gcov 的， valgrind ， gprof 的，和 lcnt 。可以随时添加或删除可能的返回值，而无需事先通知。

trans-unit.source: Returns an atom describing the dynamic trace framework compiled into the virtual machine. It can be dtrace, systemtap, or none. For a commercial or standard build, it is always none. The other return values indicate a custom configuration (for example, ./configure --with-dynamic-trace=dtrace). For more information about dynamic tracing, see dyntrace(3) manual page and the README.dtrace/README.systemtap files in the Erlang source code top directory.

Returns an atom describing the dynamic trace framework compiled into the virtual machine. It can be dtrace, systemtap, or none. For a commercial or standard build, it is always none. The other return values indicate a custom configuration (for example, ./configure --with-dynamic-trace=dtrace). trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that can be used for traversing the entries of Set; see next/1. The difference as compared to the iterator returned by iterator/1 is that the first element greater than or equal to Element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个迭代器，该迭代器可用于遍历 Set 的条目；参见 next/1 。与 iterator/1 返回的迭代器相比，区别在于返回的第一个元素大于或等于 Element 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that can be used for traversing the entries of Set; see next/1. The implementation of this is very efficient; traversing the whole set using next/1 is only slightly slower than getting the list of all elements using to_list/1 and traversing that. The main advantage of the iterator approach is that it does not require the complete list of all elements to be built in memory at one time.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个迭代器，该迭代器可用于遍历 Set 的条目；参见 next/1 。这的实现非常有效；使用 next/1 遍历整个集合仅比使用 to_list/1 遍历所有元素的列表慢一点。迭代器方法的主要优点是它不需要一次在内存中构建所有元素的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that can be used for traversing the entries of Tree; see next/1. The difference as compared to the iterator returned by iterator/1 is that the first key greater than or equal to Key is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个迭代器，该迭代器可用于遍历 Tree 的条目；参见 next/1 。与 iterator/1 返回的迭代器相比，区别在于返回的第一个密钥大于或等于 Key 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an iterator that can be used for traversing the entries of Tree; see next/1. The implementation of this is very efficient; traversing the whole tree using next/1 is only slightly slower than getting the list of all elements using to_list/1 and traversing that. The main advantage of the iterator approach is that it does not require the complete list of all elements to be built in memory at one time.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个迭代器，该迭代器可用于遍历 Tree 的条目；参见 next/1 。这的实现非常有效；使用 next/1 遍历整个树仅比使用 to_list/1 遍历所有元素的列表慢一点。迭代器方法的主要优点是它不需要一次在内存中构建所有元素的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered set of the elements in List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中元素的有序集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered-set list of the names of all variables in the syntax tree. (This includes function name variables.) An exception is thrown if Tree does not represent a well-formed Core Erlang syntax tree.
Returns an unordered list of the keys used in List, not containing duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中使用的键的无序列表，不包含重复项。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unsorted list of digraph vertices such that for each vertex in the list, there is a path from the vertex to some vertex of Vertices. In particular, as paths can have length zero, the vertices of Vertices are included in the returned list.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向图的未排序的顶点，从而对列表中的每个顶点，有一个 path 从顶点到顶点的一些 Vertices 。特别是，由于路径的长度可以为零，因此顶点的 Vertices 会包含在返回的列表中。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unsorted list of digraph vertices such that for each vertex in the list, there is a path in Digraph from some vertex of Vertices to the vertex. In particular, as paths can have length zero, the vertices of Vertices are included in the returned list.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向图的未排序的顶点，从而对列表中的每个顶点，有一个 path 中 Digraph 从一些顶点 Vertices 到顶点。特别是，由于路径的长度可以为零，因此顶点的 Vertices 会包含在返回的列表中。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unsorted list of digraph vertices such that for each vertex in the list, there is a path in Digraph of length one or more from some vertex of Vertices to the vertex. As a consequence, only those vertices of Vertices that are included in some cycle are returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回未排序的有向图顶点列表，这样对于列表中的每个顶点，有向 Digraph 中从顶点的某个顶点到 Vertices 的长度为一个或多个的 path 。因此，只有那些顶点 Vertices 包括在一些 cycle 返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unsorted list of digraph vertices such that for each vertex in the list, there is a path of length one or more from the vertex to some vertex of Vertices. Therefore only those vertices of Vertices that are included in some cycle are returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向图的一个未排序的列表顶点，使得对于列表中的每个顶点，还有一个 path 长度的一个或多个从顶点到顶点一些的 Vertices 。因此，只有那些顶点 Vertices 包括在一些 cycle 返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns and purges the list of text strings buffered during the latest session of capturing printouts to stdout. Log categories that are to be ignored in ListOfStrings can be specified with ExclCategories. If ExclCategories = [], no filtering takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回并清除在将打印 stdout 捕获到stdout的最新会话期间缓冲的文本字符串列表。可以使用 ExclCategories 指定在 ListOfStrings 中要忽略的日志类别。如果 ExclCategories = [] ，则不进行任何过滤。

trans-unit.source: Returns any plain command-line arguments as a list of strings (possibly empty).

trans-unit.source: Returns captured substrings as pairs of byte indexes into the subject string and length of the matching string in the subject (as if the subject string was flattened with erlang:iolist_to_binary/1 or unicode:characters_to_binary/2 before matching). Notice that option unicode results in byte-oriented indexes in a (possibly virtual) UTF-8 encoded binary. A byte index tuple {0,2} can therefore represent one or two characters when unicode is in effect. This can seem counter-intuitive, but has been deemed the most effective and useful way to do it. To return lists instead can result in simpler code if that is desired. This return type is the default.

Returns captured substrings as pairs of byte indexes into the subject string and length of the matching string in the subject (as if the subject string was flattened with erlang:iolist_to_binary/1 or unicode:characters_to_binary/2 before matching). Notice that option unicode results in byte-oriented indexes in a (possibly virtual) UTF-8 encoded binary. A byte index tuple {0,2} can therefore represent one or two characters when unicode is in effect. This can seem counter-intuitive, but has been deemed the most effective and useful way to do it. To return lists instead can result in simpler code if that is desired. This return type is the default.
trans-unit.target: 将捕获的子字符串返回为主题字符串和主题中匹配字符串的长度的字节索引对（就像在匹配之前使用 erlang:iolist_to_binary/1 或 unicode:characters_to_binary/2 展平了主题字符串一样）。请注意，选项 unicode 会以（可能是虚拟的）UTF-8编码二进制文件生成面向字节的索引。因此，当 unicode 有效时，字节索引元组 {0,2} 可以表示一个或两个字符。这似乎违反直觉，但被认为是最有效和有用的方法。如果需要的话，返回列表可能会导致代码更简单。此返回类型是默认类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns current Erlang system time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
Returns current Erlang system time in nativetime unit.

Returns current Erlang system time on the format {MegaSecs, Secs, MicroSecs}. This format is the same as os:timestamp/0 and the deprecated erlang:now/0 use. The reason for the existence of erlang:timestamp() is purely to simplify use for existing code that assumes this time stamp format. Current Erlang system time can more efficiently be retrieved in the time unit of your choice using erlang:system_time/1.
Returns current Erlang system time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的 Erlang system time 该时间已转换为作为参数传递的 Unit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns current Erlang system time in nativetime unit.
trans-unit.target: 以 native time unit 返回当前的 Erlang system time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns current Erlang system time on the format {MegaSecs, Secs, MicroSecs}. This format is the same as os:timestamp/0 and the deprecated erlang:now/0 use. The reason for the existence of erlang:timestamp() is purely to simplify use for existing code that assumes this time stamp format. Current Erlang system time can more efficiently be retrieved in the time unit of your choice using erlang:system_time/1.
trans-unit.target: 以 {MegaSecs, Secs, MicroSecs} 格式返回当前的 Erlang system time 。此格式与 os:timestamp/0 和不赞成使用的 erlang:now/0 相同。存在 erlang:timestamp() 的原因纯粹是为了简化对采用这种时间戳格式的现有代码的使用。可以使用 erlang:system_time/1 以您选择的时间单位更有效地检索当前的Erlang系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns matching substrings as binaries. If option unicode is used, these binaries are in UTF-8. If the \C sequence is used together with unicode, the binaries can be invalid UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 返回匹配的子字符串作为二进制。如果使用选项 unicode ，则这些二进制文件位于UTF-8中。如果\ C序列与 unicode 一起使用，则二进制文件可能是无效的UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: Returns matching substrings as lists of characters (Erlang string()s). It option unicode is used in combination with the \C sequence in the regular expression, a captured subpattern can contain bytes that are not valid UTF-8 (\C matches bytes regardless of character encoding). In that case the list capturing can result in the same types of tuples that unicode:characters_to_list/2 can return, namely three-tuples with tag incomplete or error, the successfully converted characters and the invalid UTF-8 tail of the conversion as a binary. The best strategy is to avoid using the \C sequence when capturing lists.

Returns matching substrings as lists of characters (Erlang string()s). It option unicode is used in combination with the \C sequence in the regular expression, a captured subpattern can contain bytes that are not valid UTF-8 (\C matches bytes regardless of character encoding). In that case the list capturing can result in the same types of tuples that unicode:characters_to_list/2 can return, namely three-tuples with tag incomplete or error, the successfully converted characters and the invalid UTF-8 tail of the conversion as a binary. The best strategy is to avoid using the \C sequence when capturing lists.
trans-unit.target: 返回匹配的子字符串作为字符列表（Erlang string() s）。如果将 unicode 选项与正则表达式中的\ C序列结合使用，则捕获的子模式可以包含无效的UTF-8字节（\ C匹配字节，而不考虑字符编码）。在那种情况下， list 捕获会导致 unicode:characters_to_list/2 可以返回的相同类型的元组，即具有标记 incomplete 或 error 的三元组，成功转换的字符和无效的UTF-8转换尾部（作为二进制） 。最好的策略是在捕获列表时避免使用\ C序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns no matching subpatterns, gives the single atom match as the return value of the function when matching successfully instead of the {match, list()} return. Specifying an empty list gives the same behavior.
trans-unit.target: 不返回匹配的子模式，匹配成功时将单个原子 match 作为函数的返回值，而不是 {match, list()} 返回。指定一个空列表将产生相同的行为。

trans-unit.target: 返回有关驱动程序一方面的特定信息。参数 Tag 指定获取哪个方面的信息。不同标签之间的返回 Value 有所不同：

trans-unit.source: Returns status of ongoing test. The returned list contains information about which test case is executing (a list of cases when a parallel test case group is executing), as well as counters for successful, failed, skipped, and total test cases so far.
trans-unit.target: 返回正在进行的测试的状态。返回的列表包含了哪个测试用例正在执行的信息(当一个并行测试用例组正在执行时的用例列表),以及迄今为止成功、失败、跳过和总测试用例的计数器。

trans-unit.source: Returns test progress. If Status is ongoing, tests are running on the node and are not yet finished.
trans-unit.target: 返回测试进度。如果 Status 为 ongoing ，则测试正在节点上运行并且尚未完成。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Cartesian product of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Cartesian product 的 Set1 和 Set2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Cartesian product of the non-empty tuple of sets TupleOfSets. If (x[1], ..., x[n]) is an element of the n-ary relation Relation, then x[i] is drawn from element i of TupleOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合 TupleOfSets 的非空元组的 Cartesian product 。如果（x [1]，...，x [n]）是n元关系 Relation 的元素，则x [i]从 TupleOfSets 的元素i中得出。

trans-unit.source: Returns the composite of the functions Function1 and Function2.
trans-unit.target: 返回函数 Function1 和 Function2 的 composite 。
