trans-unit.source: Returns the converse of the binary relation BinRel1.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel1 的 converse 函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of the sets Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 difference 的套 Set1 和 Set2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the domain of the binary relation BinRel.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel 的 domain 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the extension of BinRel1 such that for each element E in Set that does not belong to the domain of BinRel1, BinRel2 contains the pair (E, AnySet).
trans-unit.target: 返回 BinRel1 的 extension ，以便对于 Set 中不属于 BinRel1 的 domain 的每个元素E ， BinRel2 包含对（E， AnySet ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the external set of an atomic, ordered, or unordered set.
trans-unit.target: 返回原子集，有序集或无序集的 external set 集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field of the binary relation BinRel.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel 的 field 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the image of set Set1 under the binary relation BinRel.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 image 集 Set1 的二元关系下 BinRel 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the in-degree of vertex V of digraph G.
trans-unit.target: 返回图 G 的顶点 V 的 in-degree 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 intersection 的 Set1 和 Set2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the set of sets SetOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回 intersection 的一套套的 SetOfSets 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of function Function1.
trans-unit.target: 返回函数 Function1 的 inverse 函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse image of Set1 under the binary relation BinRel.
trans-unit.target: 返回 inverse image 的 Set1 的二元关系下 BinRel 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the library path.
trans-unit.target: 返回 library path 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the natural join of the relations Relation1 and Relation2 on coordinates I and J.
trans-unit.target: 返回坐标 I 和 J 上关系 Relation1 和 Relation2 的 natural join 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the out-degree of vertex V of digraph G.
trans-unit.target: 返回图 G 的顶点 V 的 out-degree 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the partition of Set such that two elements are considered equal if the results of applying SetFun are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set 的 partition ，如果应用 SetFun 的结果相等，则认为两个元素相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the partition of the union of the set of sets SetOfSets such that two elements are considered equal if they belong to the same elements of SetOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合 SetOfSets 的并集的 partition ，这样，如果两个元素属于 SetOfSets 的相同元素，则认为它们相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the range of the binary relation BinRel.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel 的 range 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative product of the converse of the binary relation BinRel1 and the binary relation BinRel2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 relative product 的的 converse 的二元关系 BinRel1 和二元关系 BinRel2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative product of the binary relations BinRel1 and BinRel2.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel1 和 BinRel2 的 relative product 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the restriction of the binary relation BinRel1 to Set.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制关系 BinRel1 对 Set 的 restriction 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ordered set containing the sets of the non-empty tuple TupleOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含非空元组 TupleOfSets 的集合的 ordered set 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the unordered set containing the sets of list ListOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含列表 ListOfSets 的集合的 unordered set 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the untyped empty set. empty_set() is equivalent to from_term([], ['_']).
trans-unit.target: 返回 untyped empty set 。 empty_set() 等效于 from_term([], ['_']) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the strict relation corresponding to the binary relation BinRel1.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应于二进制关系 BinRel1 的 strict relation 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the symmetric difference (or the Boolean sum) of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set1 和 Set2 的 symmetric difference （或布尔和）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of an atomic, ordered, or unordered set.
trans-unit.target: 返回 type 的原子，有序或无序组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the union of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 union 的 Set1 和 Set2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the union of the set of sets SetOfSets.
trans-unit.target: 返回 union 的一套套的 SetOfSets 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the CpuTopology currently used by the emulator. The CPU topology is used when binding schedulers to logical processors. The CPU topology used is the user-defined CPU topology, if such exists, otherwise the automatically detected CPU topology, if such exists. If no CPU topology exists, undefined is returned.

Returns the CpuTopology currently used by the emulator. The CPU topology is used when binding schedulers to logical processors. The CPU topology used is the user-defined CPU topology, if such exists, otherwise the automatically detected CPU topology, if such exists. If no CPU topology exists, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回仿真器当前使用的 CpuTopology 。将调度程序绑定到逻辑处理器时，将使用CPU拓扑。使用的CPU拓扑是 user-defined CPU topology （如果存在），否则是 automatically detected CPU topology （如果存在）。如果不存在CPU拓扑，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Nth element (numbering from 1) of Tuple, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 Tuple 的第 N 个元素（从1开始编号），例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the Nth element of List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的第 N 个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Nth tail of List, that is, the sublist of List starting at N+1 and continuing up to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的第 N 个尾部，即List的子 List 从 N+1 开始，一直持续到列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Osfamily and, in some cases, the Osname of the current OS.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Osfamily ，在某些情况下，返回当前操作系统的 Osname 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Type of operator that OpName/Arity belongs to, or generates a function_clause error if it is not an operator.
trans-unit.target: 返回 OpName/Arity 所属的运算符的 Type ，如果不是运算符，则生成 function_clause 错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Value of the environment variable VarName, or DefaultValue if the environment variable is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Value 的环境变量 VarName ，或 DefaultValue 如果环境变量是不明确的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Value of the environment variable VarName, or false if the environment variable is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回环境变量 VarName 的 Value ，如果环境变量未定义，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the et handler, which can be used with format/2 or tracer/2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 et 处理程序，可与 format/2 或 tracer/2 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the CPU time in the same format as erlang:timestamp(). The CPU time is the time the current logical CPU has spent executing since some arbitrary point in the past. If the OS does not support fetching this value, enif_cpu_time invokes enif_make_badarg.

Returns the CPU time in the same format as erlang:timestamp(). The CPU time is the time the current logical CPU has spent executing since some arbitrary point in the past. If the OS does not support fetching this value, enif_cpu_time invokes enif_make_badarg.
trans-unit.target: 以与 erlang:timestamp() 相同的格式返回CPU时间。CPU时间是当前逻辑CPU从过去的某个任意点开始执行所花费的时间。如果操作系统不支持获取此值，则 enif_cpu_time 调用 enif_make_badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Erlang object corresponding to the value of name in term. If no variable with the name name is found in term, or if term is not a valid Erlang term, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应的值二郎神对象 name 在 term 。如果在 term 中找不到 name 为name的变量，或者 term 不是有效的Erlang术语，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Erlang term represented by a syntax tree. An exception is thrown if Node does not represent a literal term.
Returns the Erlang term represented by a syntax tree. Evaluation fails with reason badarg if Node does not represent a literal term.
trans-unit.target: 返回由语法树表示的Erlang术语。如果 Node 不代表文字，则评估失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ErrorInfo structure of a warning_marker node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 warning_marker 节点的ErrorInfo结构。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ErrorInfo structure of an error_marker node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 error_marker 节点的ErrorInfo结构。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address for Host as a tuple of integers. Host can be an IP address, a single hostname, or a fully qualified hostname.
trans-unit.target: 以整数元组返回 Host 的IP地址。 Host 可以是IP地址，单个主机名或标准主机名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OS version. On most systems, this function returns a tuple, but a string is returned instead if the system has versions that cannot be expressed as three numbers.
trans-unit.target: 返回操作系统的版本。在大多数系统中,这个函数返回一个元组,但如果系统的版本不能用三个数字表示,则返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) reported by the underlying operating system. Returns local time if universal time is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 返回底层操作系统报告的世界协调时间(UTC)。如果通用时间不可用,则返回当地时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the X509 certificate subject id.
Returns the action subtree of an abstract receive-expression.
Returns the address and port for the other end of a connection.
trans-unit.target: 返回连接另一端的地址和端口。

trans-unit.source: Returns the address and port number of the peer.
trans-unit.target: 返回对等体的地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the address of the peer connected to the socket.
Returns the amount of padding before the comment, or none. The latter means that a default padding may be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回注释前的填充量，或 none 。后者意味着可以使用默认填充。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of time in seconds garbage collection of an entry in a node table is delayed. This limit can be set on startup by passing command-line flag +zdntgc to erl(1). For more information, see the documentation of the command-line flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点表中条目的垃圾回收延迟的时间（以秒为单位）。可以在启动时通过将命令行标志 +zdntgc 传递给 erl(1) 来设置此限制。有关更多信息，请参见命令行标志的文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns the application specification keys and their values for Application. If the argument is omitted, it defaults to the application of the calling process.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Application 的应用程序规范键及其值。如果省略该参数，则默认为调用进程的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument (the arity) subtree of an arity_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 arity_qualifier 节点的参数（arity）子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument (the class) subtree of a class_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 class_qualifier 节点的参数（类）子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument (the module) subtree of a module_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 module_qualifier 节点的参数（模块）子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree (the size) of a size_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 size_qualifier 节点的参数子树（大小）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of a case_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 case_expr 节点的参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of a map_expr node, if any. If Node represents "#{...}", none is returned. Otherwise, if Node represents "Argument#{...}", Argument is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_expr 节点的参数子树（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ #{...} ”， none 返回任何值。否则，如果 Node 表示“ Argument#{...} ”，则返回 Argument 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of a prefix_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 prefix_expr 节点的参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of a record_access node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_access 节点的参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of a record_expr node, if any. If Node represents "#Type{...}", none is returned. Otherwise, if Node represents "Argument#Type{...}", Argument is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_expr 节点的参数子树（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ #Type{...} ”，则不返回 none 值。否则，如果 Node 表示“ Argument#Type{...} ”，则返回 Argument 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument subtree of an abstract case-expression.
Returns the argument subtree of an abstract let-expression.
Returns the argument subtree of an abstract sequencing expression.

Returns the argument types subtrees of a function_type node. If Node represents "fun((...) -> Return)", any_arity is returned; otherwise, if Node represents "(T1, ...Tn) -> Return" or "fun((T1, ...Tn) -> Return)", [T1, ..., Tn] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 function_type 节点的参数类型子树。如果 Node 表示“ fun((...) -> Return) ”，则返回 any_arity ；否则返回false。否则，如果 Node 表示“ (T1, ...Tn) -> Return ”或“ fun((T1, ...Tn) -> Return) ”，则返回 [T1, ..., Tn] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arguments subtrees of a type_application node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 type_application 节点的参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arguments subtrees of a user_type_application node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 user_type_application 节点的参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arity of a fun_expr node. The result is the number of parameter patterns in the first clause of the fun-expression; subsequent clauses are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回 fun_expr 节点的Arity。结果是fun-表达式的第一子句中的参数模式数量；后续子句将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arity of a function node. The result is the number of parameter patterns in the first clause of the function; subsequent clauses are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回 function 节点的arity 。结果是函数第一子句中参数模式的数量；后续子句将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arity of a named_fun_expr node. The result is the number of parameter patterns in the first clause of the named fun-expression; subsequent clauses are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回 named_fun_expr 节点的Arity。结果是命名的fun-expression的第一子句中的参数模式数量；后续子句将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Returns the arity part of an abstract function name variable.

Returns the associated post-comments of a node. This is a possibly empty list of abstract comments, in top-down textual order. When the code is formatted, post-comments are typically displayed to the right of and/or below the node. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个节点的相关后注释。这是一个可能是空的抽象注释列表,按自上而下的文本顺序排列。当代码被格式化时,后注释通常显示在节点的右侧和/或下方。例如:

trans-unit.source: Returns the associated pre-comments of a node. This is a possibly empty list of abstract comments, in top-down textual order. When the code is formatted, pre-comments are typically displayed directly above the node. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个节点的相关预注释。这是一个可能是空的抽象注释列表,按自上而下的文本顺序排列。当代码被格式化时,预注释通常直接显示在节点上方。例如

trans-unit.source: Returns the atom name of the Erlang error, given the error number in error. The error atoms are einval, enoent, and so on. It can be used to make error terms from the driver.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的错误号二郎神错误的原子名称， error 。错误原子是 einval ， enoent 等。它可以用来使驱动程序产生错误条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the atom whose text representation is Binary. If Encoding is latin1, no translation of bytes in the binary is done. If Encoding is utf8 or unicode, the binary must contain valid UTF-8 sequences.
trans-unit.target: 返回其原子表示为 Binary 的原子。如果 Encoding 为 latin1 ，则不执行二进制文件中字节的转换。如果 Encoding 是 utf8 或 unicode ，则二进制文件必须包含有效的UTF-8序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the atom whose text representation is Binary. If Encoding is utf8 or unicode, the binary must contain valid UTF-8 sequences.
Returns the atom whose text representation is String, but only if there already exists such atom.
trans-unit.target: 返回其文本表示形式为 String 的原子，但仅当该原子已经存在时才返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the atom whose text representation is String.
trans-unit.target: 返回其原子表示为 String 的原子。

trans-unit.source: Returns the automatically detected CpuTopologyy. The emulator detects the CPU topology on some newer Linux, Solaris, FreeBSD, and Windows systems. On Windows system with more than 32 logical processors, the CPU topology is not detected.
trans-unit.target: 返回自动检测到的 CpuTopologyy 。仿真器在某些较新的Linux，Solaris，FreeBSD和Windows系统上检测CPU拓扑。在具有32个以上逻辑处理器的Windows系统上，未检测到CPU拓扑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average system load in the last 15 minutes, as described above. 0 represents no load, 256 represents the load reported as 1.00 by rup.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，返回最近15分钟的平均系统负载。0表示无负载，256表示报告为1.00由负载 rup 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average system load in the last five minutes, as described above. 0 represents no load, 256 represents the load reported as 1.00 by rup.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，返回最近五分钟的平均系统负载。0表示无负载，256表示报告为1.00由负载 rup 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average system load in the last minute, as described above. 0 represents no load, 256 represents the load reported as 1.00 by rup.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，返回最后一分钟的平均系统负载。0表示无负载，256表示报告为1.00由负载 rup 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the binary relation containing the elements (E, Set) such that Set belongs to SetOfSets and E belongs to Set. If SetOfSets is a partition of a set X and R is the equivalence relation in X induced by SetOfSets, then the returned relation is the canonical map from X onto the equivalence classes with respect to R.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含元素（E，Set）的二进制关系，使得Set属于 SetOfSets ，E属于Set。如果 SetOfSets 是集合X的一个 partition ，并且R是 SetOfSets 在X中引起的等价关系，则返回的关系是X到R的等价类的 canonical map 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the binding of Name in BindingStruct.
trans-unit.target: 返回的绑定 Name 中 BindingStruct 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a binary_field.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary_field 的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a catch_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 catch_expr 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a class_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 class_qualifier 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a generator node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 generator 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a match_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 match_expr 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a module_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 module_qualifier 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a parentheses node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 parentheses 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of a size_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 size_qualifier 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of an arity_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 arity_qualifier 节点的主体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the body subtree of an abstract catch-expression.
Returns the body subtree of an abstract clause.
Returns the body subtree of an abstract fun-expression.
Returns the body subtree of an abstract let-expression.
Returns the body subtree of an abstract letrec-expression.
Returns the body subtree of an abstract sequencing expression.
Returns the byte at position Pos (zero-based) in binary Subject as an integer. If Pos >= byte_size(Subject), a badarg exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 以二进制形式返回二进制 Subject 中位置 Pos （从零开始）处的字节。如果 Pos > = byte_size(Subject) ，则会引发 badarg 异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the call count value for this function or true for the pseudo function on_load if call count tracing is active. Otherwise false is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回此函数的调用计数值，如果调用计数跟踪处于活动状态，则返回伪函数 on_load 的 true 。否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the call time values for this function or true for the pseudo function on_load if call time tracing is active. Otherwise false is returned. The call time values returned, [{Pid, Count, S, Us}], is a list of each process that executed the function and its specific counters.
trans-unit.target: 返回此函数的调用时间值；如果调用时间跟踪处于活动状态，则返回伪函数 on_load 的 true 。否则返回 false 。返回的呼叫时间值 [{Pid, Count, S, Us}] 是执行该函数的每个进程及其特定计数器的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the calling function as a tuple {Module, Function, Arity} or the atom undefined if the calling function cannot be determined. Can only be used in the MatchBody part when tracing.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法确定调用函数，则返回调用函数以元组 {Module, Function, Arity} 或 undefined 的原子的形式返回。跟踪时只能在 MatchBody 零件中使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the category of Token.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的类别。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character sequence represented by a text node.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 text 节点表示的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child specification map for the child identified by Id under supervisor SupRef. The returned map contains all keys, both mandatory and optional.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 Id 在主管 SupRef 下标识的子项的子项规范图。返回的映射包含所有键，包括必需键和可选键。

trans-unit.source: Returns the code path.
trans-unit.target: 返回代码路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column of Token's collection of annotations.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的注释集合的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column of the annotations Anno.
trans-unit.target: Returns the column of the annotations Anno.

trans-unit.source: Returns the command used to start this Erlang instance. If this information could not be found, the string "no_prog_name" is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于启动此Erlang实例的命令。如果找不到此信息，则返回字符串 "no_prog_name" 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the compatibility mode of the local node as an integer. The integer returned represents the Erlang/OTP release that the current emulator has been set to be backward compatible with. The compatibility mode can be configured at startup by using command-line flag +R in erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回本地节点的兼容模式。返回的整数表示当前模拟器已设置为向后兼容的Erlang / OTP版本。兼容模式可以在启动时通过使用命令行标记被配置成 +R 在 erl(1) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the compiler library directory. Equivalent to code:lib_dir(compiler).
trans-unit.target: 返回编译器库目录。等效于 code:lib_dir(compiler) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the configuration parameters and their values for Application. If the argument is omitted, it defaults to the application of the calling process.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Application 的配置参数及其值。如果省略该参数，则默认为调用进程的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents of the specified variable in an Erlang term.
trans-unit.target: 返回Erlang术语中指定变量的内容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cookie header that would have been sent when making a request to Url using profile Profile. If no profile is specified, the default profile is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用配置文件 Profile 向 Url 请求时发送的cookie头。如果未指定配置文件，则使用默认配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the creation of the local node as an integer. The creation is changed when a node is restarted. The creation of a node is stored in process identifiers, port identifiers, and references. This makes it (to some extent) possible to distinguish between identifiers from different incarnations of a node. The valid creations are integers in the range 1..3, but this will probably change in a future release. If the node is not alive, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回本地节点的创建。重新启动节点后，将更改创建。节点的创建存储在进程标识符，端口标识符和引用中。这使得（在某种程度上）可以区分节点的不同化身的标识符。有效的创建内容是1..3范围内的整数，但是在将来的版本中可能会更改。如果该节点不活跃，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current Erlang monotonic time. Notice that it is not uncommon with negative values.
Returns the current Erlang monotonic time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 Erlang monotonic time 该时间已转换为作为参数传递的 Unit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current Erlang monotonic time in nativetime unit. This is a monotonically increasing time since some unspecified point in time.
trans-unit.target: 以 native time unit 返回当前的 Erlang monotonic time 。从某个未指定的时间点开始，这是一个单调增加的时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current Erlang monotonic time. Notice that it is not uncommon with negative values.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的 Erlang monotonic time 。请注意，负值并不罕见。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current OS system time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回转换为作为参数传递的 Unit 的当前 OS system time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current OS system time in nativetime unit.
trans-unit.target: 以 native time unit 返回当前 OS system time 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current OS system time in the same format as erlang:timestamp/0. The tuple can be used together with function calendar:now_to_universal_time/1 or calendar:now_to_local_time/1 to get calendar time. Using the calendar time, together with the MicroSecs part of the return tuple from this function, allows you to log time stamps in high resolution and consistent with the time in the rest of the OS.
trans-unit.target: 以与 erlang:timestamp/0 相同的格式返回当前 OS system time 。该元组可以与功能 calendar:now_to_universal_time/1 或 calendar:now_to_local_time/1 一起使用以获取日历时间。使用日历时间以及此功能的返回元组的 MicroSecs 部分，可以使您以高分辨率记录时间戳，并与其他操作系统中的时间保持一致。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current system_logger as set by erlang:system_flag(system_logger, _).
Returns the current address to which the socket is bound.

Returns the current call stack back-trace (stacktrace) of the process. The stack has the same format as in the catch part of a try. See The call-stack back trace (stacktrace). The depth of the stacktrace is truncated according to the backtrace_depth system flag setting.

Returns the current call stack back-trace (stacktrace) of the process. The stack has the same format as returned by erlang:get_stacktrace/0. The depth of the stacktrace is truncated according to the backtrace_depth system flag setting.
trans-unit.target: 返回该进程的当前调用堆栈回溯（stacktrace）。堆栈的格式与 erlang:get_stacktrace/0 返回的格式相同。堆栈 backtrace_depth 的深度根据backtrace_depth系统标志设置被截断。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current date and time according to Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) in the form {{Year, Month, Day}, {Hour, Minute, Second}} if supported by the underlying OS. Otherwise erlang:universaltime() is equivalent to erlang:localtime(). Example:
trans-unit.target: 如果基础操作系统支持，则根据世界标准时间（UTC）以 {{Year, Month, Day}, {Hour, Minute, Second}} 的形式返回当前日期和时间。否则， erlang:universaltime() 等效于 erlang:localtime() 。例：

trans-unit.source: Returns the current date as {Year, Month, Day}.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前日期为 {Year, Month, Day} 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current list of allowed slave hosts.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前允许的从属主机列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current local date and time, {{Year, Month, Day}, {Hour, Minute, Second}}, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的本地日期和时间 {{Year, Month, Day}, {Hour, Minute, Second}} ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the current mapping for warning events. Events sent using warning_msg/1,2 or warning_report/1,2 are tagged as errors, warnings (default), or info, depending on the value of command-line flag +W.
trans-unit.target: 返回警告事件的当前映射。使用 warning_msg/1,2 或 warning_report/1,2 发送的事件被标记为错误，警告（默认）或信息，具体取决于命令行标志 +W 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current performance counter value in perf_countertime unit. This is a highly optimized call that might not be traceable.
trans-unit.target: 以 perf_counter time unit 返回当前性能计数器值。这是一个高度优化的调用，可能无法跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current reference count of the port data lock passed as argument (pdl).
trans-unit.target: 返回作为参数（ pdl ）传递的端口数据锁的当前引用计数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current reference count on bin.
trans-unit.target: 返回 bin 上的当前引用计数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current state of process flag message_queue_data. MQD is either off_heap or on_heap. For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).
Returns the current state of process flag message_queue_data. MQD is either off_heap or on_heap. For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).
trans-unit.target: 返回进程标志 message_queue_data 的当前状态。 MQD 是 off_heap 或 on_heap 。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD) 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current system monitoring settings set by erlang:system_monitor/2 as {MonitorPid, Options}, or undefined if no settings exist. The order of the options can be different from the one that was set.

Returns the current system monitoring settings set by erlang:system_monitor/2 as {MonitorPid, Options}, or undefined if no settings exist. The order of the options can be different from the one that was set.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 erlang:system_monitor/2 设置为 {MonitorPid, Options} 的当前系统监视设置，如果没有设置，则返回 undefined 。选项的顺序可以与设置的顺序不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current system profiling settings set by erlang:system_profile/2 as {ProfilerPid, Options}, or undefined if there are no settings. The order of the options can be different from the one that was set.

Returns the current system profiling settings set by erlang:system_profile/2 as {ProfilerPid, Options}, or undefined if there are no settings. The order of the options can be different from the one that was set.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 erlang:system_profile/2 设置为 {ProfilerPid, Options} 的当前系统配置设置，如果没有设置，则返回 undefined 。选项的顺序可以与设置的顺序不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current time as {Hour, Minute, Second}.
trans-unit.target: 以 {Hour, Minute, Second} 返回当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time converted into the time_unit passed as argument.
Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time in nativetime unit. Current time offset added to an Erlang monotonic time gives corresponding Erlang system time.
Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time converted into the Unit passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Erlang monotonic time 和 Erlang system time 之间的当前时间偏移，该时间已转换为作为参数传递的 Unit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time converted into the time_unit passed as argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Erlang monotonic time 和 Erlang system time 之间的当前时间偏移，该时间转换为传递为参数的 time_unit 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current time offset between Erlang monotonic time and Erlang system time in nativetime unit. Current time offset added to an Erlang monotonic time gives corresponding Erlang system time.
trans-unit.target: 以 native time unit 返回 Erlang monotonic time 和 Erlang system time 之间的当前时间偏移。添加到Erlang单调时间的当前时间偏移会给出相应的Erlang系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current version number of the interpreter. Same as the version number of the Debugger application.
trans-unit.target: 返回解释器的当前版本号。与Debugger应用程序的版本号相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current working directory at the local client.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地客户端的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current working directory at the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 返回远程服务器的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time the specified file or directory was last modified, or 0 if the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定文件或目录的最后修改日期和时间；如果文件不存在，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the decompression dictionary currently in use by the stream. This function must be called between inflateInit/1,2 and inflateEnd.
trans-unit.target: 返回流当前正在使用的解压缩字典。必须在 inflateInit/1,2 和 inflateEnd 之间调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default encoding of Erlang source files.
trans-unit.target: 返回Erlang源文件的默认编码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default port parallelism scheduling hint used. For more information, see command-line argument +spp in erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 返回使用的默认端口并行性调度提示。有关详细信息，请参阅命令行参数 +spp 在 erl(1) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default state.
trans-unit.target: 返回默认状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default value of the message_queue_data process flag, which is either off_heap or on_heap. This default is set by command-line argument +hmqd in erl(1). For more information on the message_queue_data process flag, see documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).

Returns the default value of the message_queue_data process flag, which is either off_heap or on_heap. This default is set by command-line argument +hmqd in erl(1). For more information on the message_queue_data process flag, see documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).
trans-unit.target: 返回 message_queue_data 处理标志的默认值，即 off_heap 或 on_heap 。此默认是通过命令行参数设置 +hmqd 在 erl(1) 。有关 message_queue_data 进程标志的更多信息，请参见 process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD) 文档。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default values of one or more options.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或多个选项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the detected CPU quota the emulator is limited by. The return value is an integer saying how many processors' worth of runtime we get (between 1 and the number of logical processors), or the atom unknown if the emulator cannot detect a quota.

Returns the detected number of logical processors available to the Erlang runtime system. The return value is either an integer, or the atom unknown if the emulator cannot detect the available logical processors. The number of available logical processors is less than or equal to the number of logical processors online.

Returns the detected number of logical processors available to the Erlang runtime system. The return value is either an integer, or the atom unknown if the emulator cannot detect the available logical processors. The number of available logical processors is less than or equal to the number of logical processors online.
trans-unit.target: 返回检测到的可用于Erlang运行时系统的逻辑处理器数。如果仿真器无法检测到可用的逻辑处理器，则返回值可以是整数，也可以是 unknown 原子。可用逻辑处理器的数量小于或等于 logical processors online 的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the detected number of logical processors configured in the system. The return value is either an integer, or the atom unknown if the emulator cannot detect the configured logical processors.
trans-unit.target: 返回检测到的系统中配置的逻辑处理器数。如果仿真器无法检测到已配置的逻辑处理器，则返回值可以是整数，也可以是 unknown 原子。

trans-unit.source: Returns the detected number of logical processors online on the system. The return value is either an integer, or the atom unknown if the emulator cannot detect logical processors online. The number of logical processors online is less than or equal to the number of logical processors configured.
trans-unit.target: 返回检测到的系统上在线逻辑处理器的数量。如果仿真器无法在线检测逻辑处理器，则返回值可以是整数，也可以是 unknown 原子。联机逻辑处理器的数量小于或等于 logical processors configured 的逻辑处理器的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference between the binary relation BinRel1 and the restriction of BinRel1 to Set.
trans-unit.target: 返回二元关系之间的差异 BinRel1 和 restriction 的 BinRel1 来 Set 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference between two {Date, Time} tuples. T2 is to refer to an epoch later than T1.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个 {Date, Time} 元组之间的差。 T2 指的是比 T1 晚的纪元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory part of Filename.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Filename 的目录部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns the elements of Ordset as a list.
trans-unit.target: 以列表形式返回 Ordset 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the elements of Set as a list.
trans-unit.target: Set 的元素返回为列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the elements of Set as a list. The order of the returned elements is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Set 的元素返回为列表。返回元素的顺序是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the elements of the ordered set ASet as a tuple of sets, and the elements of the unordered set ASet as a sorted list of sets without duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 将有序集合 ASet 的元素作为集合的元组返回，将无序集合 ASet 的元素作为没有重复的集合的排序列表返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the empty list [] if memsup is not available, or if the memory check times out.
trans-unit.target: 如果 memsup 不可用，或者内存检查超时，则返回空列表[] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the encoding of Term according to the Erlang external term format as ext_iovec().
Returns the end location of the text of Token's collection of annotations. If there is no text, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的注释集合的文本的结束位置。如果没有文本，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the end location of the text of the annotations Anno. If there is no text, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回批注Anno的文本的结束位置。如果没有文本，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the error function of X, where:
trans-unit.target: 返回 X 的误差函数，其中：

trans-unit.source: Returns the exception body subtree of an abstract try-expression.
Returns the expression subtree of an abstract try-expression.
Returns the field subtree of a record_access node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_access 节点的字段子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field subtree of a record_index_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_index_expr 节点的字段子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field subtree of a typed_record_field node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 typed_record_field 节点的field子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields subtree of a record_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_type 节点的fields子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file extension of Filename, including the period. Returns an empty string if no extension exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Filename 的文件扩展名，包括句点。如果不存在扩展名，则返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file list of an open zip archive. The first returned element is the zip archive comment.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个打开的zip压缩包的文件列表。返回的第一个元素是压缩包的注释。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file name and line number of a file attribute. The result is the pair {File, Line} if Node represents "-file(File, Line).".
trans-unit.target: 返回 file 属性的文件名和行号。如果 Node 表示“ -file(File, Line). ” ，则结果为 {File, Line} 对。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename encoding mode. If it is latin1, the system translates no filenames. If it is utf8, filenames are converted back and forth to the native filename encoding (usually UTF-8, but UTF-16 on Windows).
trans-unit.target: 返回文件名编码模式。如果为 latin1 ，则系统不翻译任何文件名。如果是 utf8 ，则文件名会来回转换为本地文件名编码（通常为UTF-8，但在Windows上为UTF-16）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename of the annotations Anno. If there is no filename, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回批注Anno的文件名。如果没有文件名，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first byte of binary Subject as an integer. If the size of Subject is zero, a badarg exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回二进制 Subject 的第一个字节。如果 Subject 的大小为零，则会引发 badarg 异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first codepoint in String and the rest of String in the tail. Returns an empty list if String is empty or an {error, String} tuple if the next byte is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一码点 String 和其余 String 的尾部。如果 String 为空，则返回一个空列表；如果下一个字节无效 {error, String} 则返回一个{error，String}元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of List that compares greater than or equal to all other elements of List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的第一个元素，该元素比较大于或等于 List 的所有其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of List that compares less than or equal to all other elements of List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的第一个元素，该元素的比较小于或等于 List 的所有其他元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first entry associated with Key in List, if one exists, otherwise returns none. For an atom A in the list, the tuple {A, true} is the entry associated with A.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Key in List 相关的第一个条目（如果存在），否则返回 none 。对于列表中的原子 A ，元组 {A, true} 是与 A 关联的条目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first grapheme cluster in String and the rest of String in the tail. Returns an empty list if String is empty or an {error, String} tuple if the next byte is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一字形簇 String 和其余 String 的尾部。如果 String 为空，则返回一个空列表；如果下一个字节无效 {error, String} 则返回一个{error，String}元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first key Key in table Tab. For an ordered_set table, the first key in Erlang term order is returned. For other table types, the first key according to the internal order of the table is returned. If the table is empty, '$end_of_table' is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回表 Tab 中的第一个键 Key 。对于 ordered_set 表，将返回Erlang术语顺序中的第一个键。对于其他表类型，将根据表的内部顺序返回第一个键。如果表为空，则返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first key stored in table Name according to the internal order of the table, or '$end_of_table' if the table is empty.
trans-unit.target: 根据表的内部顺序返回存储在表 Name 中的第一个键；如果表为空，则返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first row of the result set and positions a cursor at this row.
trans-unit.target: 返回结果集的第一行,并将光标定位在这一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flags subtree of an abstract bit-string template.
Returns the float whose text representation is Binary, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回其文本表示形式为 Binary 的float ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the float whose text representation is String, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回其文本表示形式为 String 的float ，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the function constraint subtree of a constrained_function_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 constrained_function_type 节点的功能约束子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the function name represented by a syntax tree. If Node represents a function name, such as "foo/1" or "bloggs:fred/2", a uniform representation of that name is returned. Different nestings of arity and module name qualifiers in the syntax tree does not affect the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回由语法树表示的函数名称。如果 Node 表示函数名称，例如“ foo/1 ”或“ bloggs:fred/2 ”，则返回该名称的统一表示形式。语法树中的arity和模块名称限定符的不同嵌套不会影响结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the function type subtree of a constrained_function_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 constrained_function_type 节点的函数类型子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the grouped list of all subtrees of a node. If Node is a leaf node (cf. is_leaf/1), this is the empty list, otherwise the result is always a nonempty list, containing the lists of subtrees of Node, in left-to-right order as they occur in the printed program text, and grouped by category. Often, each group contains only a single subtree.

Returns the grouped list of all subtrees of a syntax tree. If Node is a leaf node (see is_leaf/1), this is the empty list, otherwise the result is always a nonempty list, containing the lists of subtrees of Node, in left-to-right order as they occur in the printed program text, and grouped by category. Often, each group contains only a single subtree.
trans-unit.target: 返回语法树的所有子树的分组列表。如果 Node 是叶节点（请参见 is_leaf/1 ），则此列表为空列表，否则结果始终为非空列表，其中包含 Node 子树的列表，在打印程序中按从左到右的顺序排列文字，并按类别分组。通常，每个组仅包含一个子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the guard subtree of a clause node, if any. If Node represents "(P1, ..., Pn) when Guard -> B1, ..., Bm", Guard is returned. Otherwise, the result is none.
trans-unit.target: 返回 clause 节点的保护子树（如果有）。如果 (P1, ..., Pn) when Guard -> B1, ..., Bm Node 表示“ （P1，...，Pn） ”，则返回 Guard 。否则，结果为 none 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the guard subtree of an abstract clause.
Returns the head element subtree of a list node. If Node represents "[Head ...]", the result will represent "Head".
trans-unit.target: 返回 list 节点的head元素子树。如果 Node 表示“ [Head ...] ”，则结果将表示“ Head ”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the head of List, that is, the first element, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的头部，即第一个元素，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the head subtree of an abstract list constructor.
Returns the heap type used by the current emulator. One heap type exists:
trans-unit.target: 返回当前模拟器使用的堆类型。只存在一种堆类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the high limit of an integer_range_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 integer_range_type 节点的上限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hook function field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 返回prettyprinter上下文的钩子函数字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for process, port, or a tuple containing the tracer module and tracer state tracing this process. If this process is not traced, the return value is [].
trans-unit.target: 返回进程，端口或包含跟踪此进程的跟踪器模块和跟踪器状态的元组的标识符。如果未跟踪此过程，则返回值为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier of the collector process.
trans-unit.target: 返回收集器进程的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier part of an abstract function name variable.
Returns the indentation if String has been printed, starting at StartIndent.
trans-unit.target: 如果已打印 String ， StartIndent 开始返回缩进。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of Character in String. Returns 0 if Character does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一次出现的索引 Character 的 String 。如果没有出现 Character ,则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the last occurrence of Character in String. Returns 0 if Character does not occur.
trans-unit.target: 返回最后一次出现的索引 Character 的 String 。如果没有出现 Character ,则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the information associated with Item for table Name. In addition to the {Item, Value} pairs defined for info/1, the following items are allowed:
trans-unit.target: 返回与表 Name 的 Item 关联的信息。除了为 info/1 定义的 {Item, Value} 对之外，还允许以下项目：

trans-unit.source: Returns the information associated with Item for table Tab, or returns undefined if Tab does not refer an existing ETS table. If Tab is not of the correct type, or if Item is not one of the allowed values, a badarg exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回与表 Tab 的 Item 相关的信息，如果 Tab 未引用现有的ETS表，则返回 undefined 。如果 Tab 不是正确的类型，或者 Item 不是允许的值之一，则会引发 badarg 异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the initialization vector to be used in the next iteration of encrypt/decrypt of type Type. Data is the encrypted data from the previous iteration step. The IVec argument is only needed for des_cfb as the vector used in the previous iteration step.
trans-unit.target: 返回将在 Type 的加密/解密的下一次迭代中使用的初始化向量。 Data 是来自上一个迭代步骤的加密数据。所述 IVec 仅需要参数 des_cfb 如在先前迭代步骤中使用的载体。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of familyFamily.
trans-unit.target: 返回的路口 family Family 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of Ordset1 and Ordset2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Ordset1 和 Ordset2 的交集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set1 和 Set2 的交集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the non-empty list of sets.
trans-unit.target: 返回非空集合的交集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the issuer id.
trans-unit.target: 返回发行人ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the issuer of the CRL.
trans-unit.target: 返回 CRL 的发行者。

trans-unit.source: Returns the keys in Tree as an ordered list.
trans-unit.target: 以有序列表的形式返回 Tree 中的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label, value-expression, and type of a record field specifier. The result is a pair {Label, {Default, Type}}, if Node represents "Label", "Label = <em>Default</em>", "Label :: <em>Type</em>", or "Label = <em>Default</em> :: <em>Type</em>". If the field has no value-expression, the value for Default will be the atom none. If the field has no type, the value for Type will be the atom none.
trans-unit.target: 返回记录字段说明符的标签，值表达式和类型。如果 Node 代表“ Label ”，“ Label = <em>Default</em> ”，“ Label :: <em>Type</em> ”，则结果为一对 {Label, {Default, Type}} ，或者“ Label = <em>Default</em> :: <em>Type</em> ”。如果该字段没有value-expression，则 Default 的值将是原子 none 。如果字段没有类型，则 Type 的值将为原子 none 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest element in Set. Assumes that Set is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set 中最大的元素。假定 Set 不为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest integer not greater than Number. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回不大于 Number 的最大整数。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest of Term1 and Term2. If the terms are equal, Term1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Term1 和 Term2 中的最大值。如果条件相等，则返回 Term1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last byte of binary Subject as an integer. If the size of Subject is zero, a badarg exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回二进制 Subject 的最后一个字节。如果 Subject 的大小为零，则会引发 badarg 异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last component of Filename with extension Ext stripped. This function is to be used to remove a (possible) specific extension. To remove an existing extension when you are unsure which one it is, use rootname(basename(Filename)).
trans-unit.target: 返回扩展名为 Ext 的 Filename 的最后一个组成部分。此功能用于删除（可能的）特定扩展名。要在不确定某个扩展名时删除现有扩展名，请使用 rootname(basename(Filename)) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last component of Filename, or Filename itself if it does not contain any directory separators.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Filename 的最后一个组成部分；如果不包含任何目录分隔符，则返回 Filename 本身。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element in List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last key Key according to Erlang term order in table Tab of type ordered_set. For other table types, the function is synonymous to first/1. If the table is empty, '$end_of_table' is returned.
trans-unit.target: 根据Erlang术语顺序，返回 ordered_set 类型的表 Tab 中的最后一个键 Key 。对于其他表类型，该函数与 first/1 是同义词。如果表为空，则返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last row of the result set and positions a cursor at this row.
trans-unit.target: 返回结果集的最后一行,并将光标定位在这一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the left argument subtree of an infix_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 infix_expr 节点的左参数子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of List, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的长度，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of list, or -1 if list is not an I/O list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 list 的长度，如果 list 不是I / O列表，则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of an I/O list.
trans-unit.target: 返回I/O列表的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the longest common prefix of the binaries in list Binaries.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表 Binaries 中二进制文件的最长公共前缀的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the longest common suffix of the binaries in list Binaries.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表 Binaries 中二进制文件的最长公共后缀的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the longest path in the tree. A leaf node has depth zero, the tree representing "{foo, bar}" has depth one, etc.
Returns the length of the maximum initial segment of String, which consists entirely of characters from Chars.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 的最大初始段的长度，该长度完全由 Chars 中的字符组成。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the maximum initial segment of String, which consists entirely of characters not from Chars.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 的最大初始段的长度，该长度完全由非 Chars 字符组成。

trans-unit.source: Returns the library directory, $OTPROOT/lib, where $OTPROOT is the root directory of Erlang/OTP.
trans-unit.target: 返回库目录 $OTPROOT/lib ，其中 $OTPROOT 是Erlang / OTP的根目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the limit for number of ETS tables. This limit is partially obsolete and number of tables are only limited by available memory.
trans-unit.target: 返回ETS表数量的限制。此限制已 partially obsolete ，表的数量仅受可用内存的限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line of Token's collection of annotations.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的注释集合行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line of the annotations Anno.
trans-unit.target: Returns the line of the annotations Anno.

trans-unit.source: Returns the line widh field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 返回prettyprinter上下文的行宽字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the lines of text of the abstract comment.
trans-unit.target: 返回抽象注释的文字行数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of "after" subtrees of a try_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 try_expr 节点的“之后”子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of action body subtrees of a receive_expr node. If Node represents "receive C1; ...; Cn end", this is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 receive_expr 节点的动作主体子树的列表。如果 Node 表示“ receive C1; ...; Cn end ”，则为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of all abstract variables in a pattern. An exception is thrown if Node does not represent a well-formed Core Erlang clause pattern. The order of listing is not defined.

Returns the list of all abstract variables in the given patterns. An exception is thrown if some element in Patterns does not represent a well-formed Core Erlang clause pattern. The order of listing is not defined.
Returns the list of all abstract variables in the patterns of an abstract clause. The order of listing is not defined.
Returns the list of all currently loaded modules for which module_status/1 returns modified. See also all_loaded/0.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有当前已加载模块的列表，其 module_status/1 返回已 modified 。另请参见 all_loaded/0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of all entries associated with Key in List. If no such entry exists, the result is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Key in List 相关的所有条目的列表。如果不存在这样的条目，则结果为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of all test cases and test case groups in the test suite module to be executed. This list also specifies the order the cases and groups are executed by Common Test. A test case is represented by an atom, the name of the test case function, or a testcase tuple indicating that the test case shall be repeated. A test case group is represented by a group tuple, where GroupName, an atom, is the name of the group (defined in Module:groups/0). Execution properties for groups can also be specified, both for a top-level group and for any of its subgroups. Group execution properties specified here override properties in the group definition (see Module:groups/0). (With value default, the group definition properties are used).

Returns the list of all test cases and test case groups in the test suite module to be executed. This list also specifies the order the cases and groups are executed by Common Test. A test case is represented by an atom, the name of the test case function. A test case group is represented by a group tuple, where GroupName, an atom, is the name of the group (defined in groups/0). Execution properties for groups can also be specified, both for a top-level group and for any of its subgroups. Group execution properties specified here override properties in the group definition (see groups/0). (With value default, the group definition properties are used).
trans-unit.target: 返回要执行的测试套件模块中所有测试用例和测试用例组的列表。此列表还指定了 Common Test 执行案例和组的顺序。测试用例由原子表示，即测试用例函数的名称。测试用例组由一个 group 元组表示，其中 GroupName 是一个原子，是该组的名称（在 groups/0 中定义）。还可以为顶级组及其任何子组指定组的执行属性。此处指定的组执行属性将覆盖组定义中的属性（请参阅 groups/0 ）。 （使用 default 值时，使用组定义属性）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of argument subtrees of a macro node, if any. If Node represents "?Name", none is returned. Otherwise, if Node represents "?Name(A1, ..., An)", [A1, ..., An] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 macro 节点的参数子树的列表（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ ?Name ”， none 返回任何值。否则，如果 Node 表示“ ?Name(A1, ..., An) ”，则返回 [A1, ..., An] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of argument subtrees of an application node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 application 节点的参数子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of argument subtrees of an attribute node, if any. If Node represents "-Name.", the result is none. Otherwise, if Node represents "-Name(E1, ..., En).", [E1, ..., E1] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 attribute 节点的参数子树的列表（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ -Name. ”，则结果为 none 。否则，如果 Node 表示“ -Name(E1, ..., En). ”，则返回 [E1, ..., E1] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of argument subtrees of an abstract function application.
Returns the list of argument subtrees of an abstract inter-module call.
Returns the list of argument subtrees of an abstract primitive operation call.
Returns the list of bindings contained in the binding structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定结构中包含的绑定列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a binary_comp node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary_comp 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a block_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 block_expr 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a conjunction node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 conjunction 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a disjunction node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 disjunction 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a list_comp node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 list_comp 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of body subtrees of a try_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 try_expr 节点的主体子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of case-clause subtrees of a try_expr node. If Node represents "try Body catch H1; ...; Hn end", the result is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 try_expr 节点的大小写子树列表。如果 Node 表示“ try Body catch H1; ...; Hn end ”，则结果为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print Latin1String as a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回将 Latin1String 打印为字符串所需的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print String as a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回将 String 打印为字符串所需的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print String as a string. Non-Latin-1 characters are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回将 String 打印为字符串所需的字符列表。非拉丁1字符被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print a character constant in the ISO Latin-1 character set.
trans-unit.target: 返回ISO Latin-1字符集中打印字符常量所需的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print a character constant in the Unicode character set.
trans-unit.target: 返回Unicode字符集中打印字符常量所需的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print a character constant in the Unicode character set. Non-Latin-1 characters are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回Unicode字符集中打印字符常量所需的字符列表。非拉丁语1的字符会被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print atom Atom.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印原子 Atom 所需的字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of characters needed to print atom Atom. Non-Latin-1 characters are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印原子 Atom 所需的字符列表。非拉丁1字符被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a case_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 case_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a cond_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 cond_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a fun_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 fun_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a function node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 function 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a named_fun_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 named_fun_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of a receive_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 receive_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of an if_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 if_expr 节点的子句子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of clause subtrees of an abstract case-expression.
Returns the list of clause subtrees of an abstract receive-expression.
Returns the list of definitions of an abstract letrec-expression. If Node represents "letrec V1 = F1 ... Vn = Fn in Body", the returned value is [{V1, F1}, ..., {Vn, Fn}].
Returns the list of element subtrees of a tuple node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tuple 节点的元素子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of element subtrees of a list skeleton. Node must represent a proper list. E.g., if Node represents "[X1, X2 | [X3, X4 | []]", then list_elements(Node) yields the list [X1, X2, X3, X4].
trans-unit.target: 返回列表框架的元素子树的列表。 Node 必须代表一个正确的列表。例如，如果 Node 表示“ [X1, X2 | [X3, X4 | []] ””，则 list_elements(Node) 产生列表 [X1, X2, X3, X4] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of element subtrees of an abstract list. Node must represent a proper list. E.g., if Node represents "[X1, X2 | [X3, X4 | []]", then list_elements(Node) yields the list [X1, X2, X3, X4].
Returns the list of element subtrees of an abstract tuple.
Returns the list of element subtrees of an abstract value list.
Returns the list of exception variable subtrees of an abstract try-expression.
Returns the list of exports subtrees of an abstract module definition.
Returns the list of field subtrees of a binary node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary 节点的字段子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of field subtrees of a map_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_expr 节点的字段子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of field subtrees of a map_type node. If Node represents "map()", any_size is returned; otherwise, if Node represents "#{F1, ..., Fn}", [F1, ..., Fn] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_type 节点的字段子树的列表。如果 Node 表示“ map() ”，则返回 any_size ；否则返回false。否则，如果 Node 表示“ #{F1, ..., Fn} ”，则返回 [F1, ..., Fn] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of field subtrees of a record_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_expr 节点的字段子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of function definitions of an abstract module definition.
Returns the list of function names declared by an export attribute. We do not guarantee that each name occurs at most once in the list. The order of listing is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 返回导出属性声明的函数名称列表。我们不保证每个名称在列表中最多出现一次。列表的顺序没有定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of handler-clause subtrees of a try_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 try_expr 节点的处理程序子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of left-hand side function variable subtrees of a letrec-expression. If Node represents "letrec V1 = F1 ... Vn = Fn in Body", the returned value is [V1, ..., Vn].
Returns the list of left-hand side function variable subtrees of an abstract module definition.
Returns the list of left-hand side variables of an abstract let-expression.
Returns the list of pairs of attribute key/value subtrees of an abstract module definition.
Returns the list of parameter subtrees of an abstract fun-expression.
Returns the list of pattern subtrees of a clause node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 clause 节点的模式子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of pattern subtrees of an abstract clause.
Returns the list of segment subtrees of an abstract binary-template.
Returns the list of subnodes of a form_list node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 form_list 节点的子节点列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of subtrees of a data constructor node. If the arity of the constructor is zero, the result is the empty list.
Returns the list of success variable subtrees of an abstract try-expression.
Returns the list of type element subtrees of a tuple_type node. If Node represents "tuple()", any_size is returned; otherwise, if Node represents "{T1, ..., Tn}", [T1, ..., Tn] is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tuple_type 节点的类型元素子树的列表。如果 Node 表示“ tuple() ”，则返回 any_size ；否则返回false。否则，如果 Node 表示“ {T1, ..., Tn} ”，则返回 [T1, ..., Tn] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of type subtrees of a type_union node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 type_union 节点的类型子树的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of type-specifier subtrees of a binary_field node. If Node represents ".../T1, ..., Tn", the result is [T1, ..., Tn], otherwise the result is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary_field 节点的类型说明符子树的列表。如果 Node 表示“ .../T1, ..., Tn ”，则结果为 [T1, ..., Tn] ，否则结果为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of user annotations associated with a syntax tree node. For a newly created node, this is the empty list. The annotations may be any terms.
trans-unit.target: 返回与语法树节点相关联的用户注释列表。对于一个新创建的节点,这是一个空列表。注解可以是任何术语。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by a char node. This includes the leading "$" character. Characters beyond 255 will be escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 char 节点表示的文字字符串。这包括前导“ $ ”字符。超过255个字符将被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by a char node. This includes the leading "$" character. Depending on the encoding a character beyond 255 will be escaped (latin1) or copied as is (utf8).
trans-unit.target: 返回由 char 节点表示的文字字符串。这包括前导“ $ ”字符。根据编码，超过255的字符将被转义（ latin1 ）或原样复制（ utf8 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by a string node. This includes surrounding double-quote characters. Characters beyond 255 will be escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 string 节点表示的文字字符串。这包括周围的双引号字符。超过255个字符将被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by a string node. This includes surrounding double-quote characters. Depending on the encoding characters beyond 255 will be escaped (latin1) or copied as is (utf8).
trans-unit.target: 返回由 string 节点表示的文字字符串。这包括周围的双引号字符。根据编码的不同，超过255个字符将被转义（ latin1 ）或原样复制（ utf8 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by an atom node. This includes surrounding single-quote characters if necessary. Characters beyond 255 will be escaped.
trans-unit.target: 返回 atom 节点表示的文字字符串。如有必要，包括单引号引起来的字符。超过255个字符将被转义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by an atom node. This includes surrounding single-quote characters if necessary. Depending on the encoding a character beyond 255 will be escaped (latin1) or copied as is (utf8).
trans-unit.target: 返回 atom 节点表示的文字字符串。如有必要，包括单引号引起来的字符。根据编码，超过255的字符将被转义（ latin1 ）或原样复制（ utf8 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by an operator node. This is simply the operator name as a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 operator 节点表示的文字字符串。这只是字符串形式的运算符名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the literal string represented by an abstract atom. This always includes surrounding single-quote characters.

Returns the literal string represented by an abstract character. This includes a leading $ character. Currently, all characters that are not in the set of ISO 8859-1 (Latin-1) "printing" characters will be escaped.

Returns the literal string represented by an abstract string. This includes surrounding double-quote characters "...". Currently, characters that are not in the set of ISO 8859-1 (Latin-1) "printing" characters will be escaped, except for spaces.
Returns the local address and port number for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个套接字的本地地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local address and port number of socket Socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字 Socket 的本地地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local address and port number of socket SslSocket.
Returns the local hostname. Never fails.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地主机名。永远不会失败。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local port number for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回套接字的本地端口号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local time reported by the underlying operating system.
trans-unit.target: 返回底层操作系统报告的当地时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of Token's collection of annotations.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的注释集合的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of the annotations Anno.
trans-unit.target: 返回注释Anno的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the log name given the pid of a disk log process on the current node, or undefined if the specified pid is not a disk log process.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定当前节点上磁盘日志进程的pid的日志名称，如果指定的pid不是磁盘日志进程，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logged system events in the debug structure, that is the last argument to handle_debug/4.
Returns the low limit of an integer_range_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 integer_range_type 节点的下限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the magic cookie of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前节点的魔法cookie。

trans-unit.source: Returns the magic cookie of the local node if the node is alive, otherwise the atom nocookie.
trans-unit.target: 如果该节点处于活动状态，则返回该本地节点的魔术cookie，否则返回原子 nocookie 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the match specification for this event, if it has one, or true if no match specification has been set.
trans-unit.target: 返回此事件的匹配规范（如果有），如果没有设置匹配规范，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the match specification for this function, if it has one. If the function is locally or globally traced but has no match specification defined, the returned value is [].
trans-unit.target: 返回此函数的匹配规范（如果有）。如果该函数是本地或全局跟踪的，但未定义匹配规范，则返回值为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the matching values or configuration elements, given a configuration variable key or its associated name (if one has been specified with ct:require/2 or a require statement).
trans-unit.target: 给定配置变量键或其关联名称（如果已使用 ct:require/2 或 require 语句指定了该值），则返回匹配的值或配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum number of atoms allowed. This limit can be increased at startup by passing command-line flag +t to erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 返回允许的最大原子数。可以在启动时通过将命令行标志 +t 传递给 erl(1) 来增加此限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum number of simultaneously existing ports at the local node as an integer. This limit can be configured at startup by using command-line flag +Q in erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回本地节点上同时存在的最大端口数。这个限制可以在启动时通过使用命令行标记被配置成 +Q 在 erl(1) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum number of simultaneously existing processes at the local node. The value is given as an integer. This limit can be configured at startup by using command-line flag +P in erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点上同时存在的最大进程数。该值以整数形式给出。这个限制可以在启动时通过使用命令行标记被配置成 +P 在 erl(1) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the memory size in bytes allocated for memory of type Type. The argument can also be specified as a list of memory_type() atoms, in which case a corresponding list of {memory_type(), Size :: integer >= 0} tuples is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回分配给 Type 类型的内存的内存大小（以字节为单位）。该参数也可以指定为 memory_type() 原子的列表，在这种情况下，将返回 {memory_type(), Size :: integer >= 0} 元组的对应列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the merged (union) set of Ordset1 and Ordset2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Ordset1 和 Ordset2 的合并（联合）集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the merged (union) set of Set1 and Set2.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set1 和 Set2 的合并（联合）集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the merged (union) set of the list of sets.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合列表的合并(联合)集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the meta-trace match specification for this function, if it has one. If the function is meta-traced but has no match specification defined, the returned value is [].
trans-unit.target: 返回此函数的元跟踪匹配规范（如果有）。如果该函数是元跟踪的，但未定义匹配规范，则返回值为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the meta-trace tracer process, port, or trace module for this function, if it has one. If the function is not meta-traced, the returned value is false. If the function is meta-traced but has once detected that the tracer process is invalid, the returned value is [].
trans-unit.target: 返回此函数的meta-trace跟踪程序进程，端口或跟踪模块（如果有）。如果该函数未进行元跟踪，则返回值为 false 。如果该函数是元跟踪的，但是一旦检测到跟踪进程无效，则返回的值为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the modified timing-level (an integer) if modified timing is enabled, otherwise undefined. For more information about modified timing, see command-line flag +T in erl(1)
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了修改的时序，则返回修改的时序级别（整数），否则返回 undefined 。有关修正的定时的更多信息，请参见命令行标志 +T 在 erl(1)

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name and (if present) list of function names declared by an import attribute. The returned value is an atom Module or a pair {Module, Names}, where Names is a list of function names declared as imported from the module named by Module. We do not guarantee that each name occurs at most once in Names. The order of listing is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 返回由导入属性声明的模块名称和功能名称列表（如果存在）。返回的值是原子 Module 或一对 {Module, Names} ，其中 Names 是声明为从Module命名的 Module 导入的函数名称的列表。我们不保证每个名称最多只能在 Names 中出现一次。列表顺序未定义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module name and possible parameters declared by a module attribute. If the attribute is a plain module declaration such as -module(name), the result is the module name. If the attribute is a parameterized module declaration, the result is a tuple containing the module name and a list of the parameter variable names.
trans-unit.target: 返回模块名称和模块属性声明的可能参数。如果属性是简单的模块声明，例如 -module(name) ，则结果是模块名称。如果属性是参数化的模块声明，则结果是一个包含模块名称和参数变量名称列表的元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the module subtree of an abstract inter-module call.

Returns the module version or versions. A version is defined by module attribute -vsn(Vsn). If this attribute is not specified, the version defaults to the checksum of the module. Notice that if version Vsn is not a list, it is made into one, that is {ok,{Module,[Vsn]}} is returned. If there are many -vsn module attributes, the result is the concatenated list of versions.
trans-unit.target: 返回模块版本。版本由模块属性 -vsn(Vsn) 定义。如果未指定此属性，则版本默认为模块的校验和。请注意，如果版本 Vsn 不是列表，则将其组合为一个列表，即返回 {ok,{Module,[Vsn]}} 。如果 -vsn 模块属性很多，则结果是版本的串联列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the most relevant information about the connection, ssl options that are undefined will be filtered out. Note that values that affect the security of the connection will only be returned if explicitly requested by connection_information/2.
trans-unit.target: 返回连接的最相关信息,未定义的ssl选项将被过滤掉。请注意,只有当连接_information/2明确要求时,才会返回影响连接安全的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name and arity of a function definition. The result is a pair {Name, A} if Node represents a function definition "Name(<em>P_1</em>, ..., <em>P_A</em>) -> ...".
trans-unit.target: 返回函数定义的名称和参数。如果 Node 表示函数定义“ Name(<em>P_1</em>, ..., <em>P_A</em>) -> ... ” ，则结果为 {Name, A} 对。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name and the list of fields of a record declaration attribute. The result is a pair {Name, Fields}, if Node represents "-record(Name, {...}).", where Fields is a list of pairs {Label, {Default, Type}} for each field "Label", "Label = <em>Default</em>", "Label :: <em>Type</em>", or "Label = <em>Default</em> :: <em>Type</em>" in the declaration, listed in left-to-right order. If the field has no default-value declaration, the value for Default will be the atom none. If the field has no type declaration, the value for Type will be the atom none. We do not guarantee that each label occurs at most once in the list.
trans-unit.target: 返回记录声明属性的名称和字段列表。如果 Node 表示“ -record(Name, {...}). ” ，则结果为 {Name, Fields} 对，其中 Fields 是每个“ Label ” 标签对 {Label, {Default, Type}} 对的列表”，“ Label = <em>Default</em> ”，“ Label :: <em>Type</em> ”或“ Label = <em>Default</em> :: <em>Type</em> 在声明中，以从左到右的顺序列出。如果该字段没有默认值声明，则 Default 的值为原子 none 。如果该字段没有类型声明，则 Type 的值将是原子 none 。我们不保证每个标签在列表中最多出现一次。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name and value of a "wild" attribute. The result is the pair {Name, Value}, if Node represents "-Name(Value)".
trans-unit.target: 返回“野生”属性的名称和值。如果 Node 表示“ -Name(Value) ” ，则结果为 {Name, Value} 对。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a variable node as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回 variable 节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a variable node as an atom.
trans-unit.target: 以原子形式返回 variable 节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a called function. The result is a representation of the name of the applied function F/A, if Node represents a function application "<em>F</em>(<em>X_1</em>, ..., <em>X_A</em>)". If the function is not explicitly named (i.e., F is given by some expression), only the arity A is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回被调用函数的名称。其结果是施加的函数名的表示 F/A ，如果 Node 表示的函数的应用程序“ <em>F</em>(<em>X_1</em>, ..., <em>X_A</em>) ”。如果函数没有明确命名（即 F 被一些表达式给出），只有元数 A 返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a used type. The result is a representation of the name of the used pre-defined or local type N/A, if Node represents a local (user) type application "<em>N</em>(<em>T_1</em>, ..., <em>T_A</em>)", or a representation of the name of the used remote type M:N/A if Node represents a remote user type application "<em>M</em>:<em>N</em>(<em>T_1</em>, ..., <em>T_A</em>)".
trans-unit.target: 返回使用类型的名称。如果 Node 代表本地（用户）类型的应用程序“ <em>N</em>(<em>T_1</em>, ..., <em>T_A</em>) ” ，则结果表示使用的预定义或本地类型 N/A 的名称。...，<em> T_A </ em>）或使用的远程类型名称的表示形式 M:N/A (如果 Node 表示远程用户类型应用程序“ <em>M</em>:<em>N</em>(<em>T_1</em>, ..., <em>T_A</em>) “。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of an operator node. Note that the name is returned as an atom.
trans-unit.target: 返回 operator 节点的名称。请注意，该名称作为原子返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of an abstract variable.
Returns the name of an implicit fun expression "fun <em>F</em>". The result is a representation of the function name F. (Cf. analyze_function_name/1.)
trans-unit.target: 返回隐式有趣表达式“ fun <em>F</em> ”的名称。结果是函数名称 F 的表示。（请参阅 analyze_function_name/1 ）

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the application to which the process Pid or the module Module belongs. Providing no argument is the same as calling get_application(self()).
trans-unit.target: 返回进程 Pid 或模块 Module 所属的应用程序的名称。不提供参数与调用 get_application(self()) 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the current host.
Returns the name of the current node. Allowed in guards.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前节点的名称。允许在守卫中使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the escript that is executed. If the function is invoked outside the context of an escript, the behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 返回被执行的escript的名称。如果该函数在escript的上下文之外被调用,则该函数的行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the local host. If Erlang was started with command-line flag -name, Name is the fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地主机的名称。如果Erlang以命令行标志 -name 开头，则 Name 是标准名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the local node. If the node is not alive, nonode@nohost is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点的名称。如果节点不是活动的，则返回 nonode@nohost 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the log file Filename, or {error, no_log_file} if logging to file is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 返回日志文件 Filename 的名称，如果未启用记录到文件，则返回 {error, no_log_file} 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the target that the specified connection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定连接所属的目标名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a constraint node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 constraint 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a function node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 function 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a macro node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 macro 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a map_field_assoc node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_field_assoc 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a map_field_exact node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_field_exact 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a map_type_assoc node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_type_assoc 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a map_type_exact node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 map_type_exact 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a named_fun_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 named_fun_expr 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a record_field node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_field 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a record_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_type 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of a record_type_field node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 record_type_field 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of an annotated_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 annotated_type 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 attribute 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of an implicit_fun node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 implicit_fun 节点的名称子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name subtree of an abstract inter-module call.
Returns the name subtree of an abstract module definition.
Returns the name subtree of an abstract primitive operation call.
Returns the names of all group nodes, regardless of their current status.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有组节点的名称,无论其当前状态如何。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of the disk logs accessible on the current node. The first list contains local disk logs and the second list contains distributed disk logs.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前节点上可访问的磁盘日志的名称。第一个列表包含本地磁盘日志,第二个列表包含分布式磁盘日志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of variables occurring in a syntax tree, The result is a set of variable names represented by atoms. Macro names are not included.
trans-unit.target: 返回在语法树中出现的变量名称,结果是一组由原子表示的变量名称。不包括宏名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next Erlang form from the opened Erlang source file. Tuple {eof, Line} is returned at the end of the file. The first form corresponds to an implicit attribute -file(File,1)., where File is the file name.
trans-unit.target: 从打开的Erlang源文件返回下一个Erlang表单。元组 {eof, Line} 返回文件的末尾。第一种形式对应于隐式属性 -file(File,1). ，其中 File 是文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next key Key2, following key Key1 in table Tab. For table type ordered_set, the next key in Erlang term order is returned. For other table types, the next key according to the internal order of the table is returned. If no next key exists, '$end_of_table' is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回下一个键 Key2 ，紧随表 Tab 中的键 Key1 。对于表类型 ordered_set ，返回Erlang术语顺序中的下一个键。对于其他表类型，将根据表的内部顺序返回下一个键。如果不存在下一个键，则返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next key-value association in Iterator and a new iterator for the remaining associations in the iterator.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Iterator 中的下一个键值关联，以及迭代器中其余关联的新迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next row of the result set relative the current cursor position and positions the cursor at this row. If the cursor is positioned at the last row of the result set when this function is called the returned value will be {selected, ColNames,[]} e.i. the list of row values is empty indicating that there is no more data to fetch.
trans-unit.target: 返回相对于当前光标位置的结果集的下一行，并将光标定位在此行。如果在调用此函数时光标位于结果集的最后一行，则返回的值将被 {selected, ColNames,[]} ei所取代。行值的列表为空，指示没有更多数据可取。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node where Arg originates. Arg can be a process identifier, a reference, or a port. If the local node is not alive, nonode@nohost is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Arg 起源的节点。 Arg 可以是进程标识符，引用或端口。如果本地节点不活跃，则返回 nonode@nohost 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node where Arg, a pid, reference, or port, is located.
trans-unit.target: 返回pid，引用或端口 Arg 所在的节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node with the expected lowest future load.
trans-unit.target: Returns the node with the expected minimum future load.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of ETS tables currently existing at the local node.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点当前存在的ETS表的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of UNIX processes running on this machine. This is a crude way of measuring the system load, but it may be of interest in some cases.
trans-unit.target: 返回在此机器上运行的UNIX进程数量。这是衡量系统负载的一种粗略的方法,但在某些情况下可能会引起人们的兴趣。
