trans-unit.source: Returns the number of active sockets.
Returns the number of argument subtrees of an abstract function application.
Returns the number of argument subtrees of an abstract inter-module call.
Returns the number of argument subtrees of an abstract primitive operation call.
Returns the number of async threads in the async thread pool used for asynchronous driver calls ( erl_driver:driver_async()). The value is given as an integer.
Returns the number of async threads in the async thread pool used for asynchronous driver calls (erl_driver:driver_async()). The value is given as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回异步线程池中用于异步驱动程序调用的异步线程数（ erl_driver:driver_async() ）。该值以整数形式给出。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of atoms currently existing at the local node. The value is given as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点当前存在的原子数。此值为整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes currently in the driver queue.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前驱动队列中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes remaining in the queue on success, otherwise -1.
trans-unit.target: 成功返回队列中剩余的字节数，否则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes written (including terminating NULL character) or 0 if term is not an atom with maximum length of size-1.
trans-unit.target: 返回写入的字节数（包括终止 NULL 字符） 0 如果 term 不是最大长度为 size-1 的原子，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in String.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters that have been scanned up to that point, including whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回截至该点已扫描的字符数,包括空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters written on success, otherwise a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 返回成功写入的字符数,否则为负值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads used by the emulator. Dirty CPU schedulers execute CPU-bound native functions, such as NIFs, linked-in driver code, and BIFs that cannot be managed cleanly by the normal emulator schedulers.
trans-unit.target: 返回仿真器使用的dirty CPU调度线程的数量。脏CPU调度器执行与CPU相关的本地函数,如NIF、linked-in驱动代码和BIF,这些函数不能被普通模拟器调度器管理干净。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dirty CPU schedulers online. The return value satisfies 1 <= DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline <= N, where N is the smallest of the return values of erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) and erlang:system_info(schedulers_online).
trans-unit.target: 返回在线的脏CPU调度程序的数量。返回值满足 1 <= DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline <= N ，其中 N 是 erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) 和 erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) 的最小返回值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dirty I/O schedulers as an integer. Dirty I/O schedulers execute I/O-bound native functions, such as NIFs and linked-in driver code, which cannot be managed cleanly by the normal emulator schedulers.
trans-unit.target: 返回 dirty I/O 调度器的数量,为整数。脏I/O调度器执行I/O绑定的本地函数,如NIF和linked-in驱动代码,这些函数不能被普通仿真器调度器管理干净。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of edges of digraph G.
trans-unit.target: 返回有向图 G 的边数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of element subtrees of a list skeleton. Node must represent a proper list. E.g., if Node represents "[X1 | [X2, X3 | [X4, X5, X6]]]", then list_length(Node) returns the integer 6.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表框架的元素子树的数量。 Node 必须代表一个正确的列表。例如，如果 Node 表示“ [X1 | [X2, X3 | [X4, X5, X6]]] ”，则 list_length(Node) 返回整数6。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of element subtrees of an abstract list. Node must represent a proper list. E.g., if Node represents "[X1 | [X2, X3 | [X4, X5, X6]]]", then list_length(Node) returns the integer 6.
Returns the number of element subtrees of an abstract tuple.
Returns the number of element subtrees of an abstract value list.
Returns the number of elements in Ordset.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Ordset 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in Set.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set 中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in a tuple or the number of bytes in a binary or bitstring, for example:
trans-unit.target: 例如,返回元组中的元素数或二进制或比特串中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in an Orddict.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Orddict 中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in an encoded term.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个编码项中的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in dictionary Dict.
trans-unit.target: 返回字典 Dict 中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements of a tuple node.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements of the ordered or unordered set ASet.
trans-unit.target: 返回有序或无序集合 ASet 的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of exact reductions.
trans-unit.target: 返回精确还原的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of functions matching argument MFA. This is zero if none matched.
trans-unit.target: 返回与参数 MFA 匹配的函数数。如果不匹配，则为零。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of grapheme clusters in String.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的字素簇的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of key-value associations in Map. This operation occurs in constant time.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Map 中的键值关联数。此操作在固定时间内进行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of left-hand side variables of an abstract let-expression.
Returns the number of milliseconds in Hours + Minutes + Seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回以 Hours + Minutes + Seconds 为单位的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of milliseconds in Hours.
trans-unit.target: 返回以 Hours 为单位的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of milliseconds in Minutes.
trans-unit.target: 返回以 Minutes 为单位的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of milliseconds in Seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回以 Seconds 为单位的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of nodes in Tree.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Tree 中的节点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of objects in the table, a non-negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回表中对象的数量,是一个非负的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of parameter subtrees of an abstract fun-expression.
Returns the number of pattern subtrees of an abstract clause.
Returns the number of ports (an integer() >= 0) using the driver.
trans-unit.target: 使用驱动程序返回端口数（ integer() >= 0 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of ports currently existing at the local node. The value is given as an integer. This is the same value as returned by length(erlang:ports()), but more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点上当前存在的端口数。该值以整数形式给出。该值与 length(erlang:ports()) 返回的值相同，但效率更高。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of processes currently existing at the local node. The value is given as an integer. This is the same value as returned by length(processes()), but more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 返回本地节点上当前存在的进程数。该值以整数形式给出。该值与 length(processes()) 返回的值相同，但效率更高。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of scheduler threads used by the emulator. Scheduler threads online schedules Erlang processes and Erlang ports, and execute Erlang code and Erlang linked-in driver code.
trans-unit.target: 返回仿真器使用的调度器线程数量。调度器线程在线调度Erlang进程和Erlang端口,并执行Erlang代码和Erlang联动驱动代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of schedulers online. The scheduler identifiers of schedulers online satisfy the relationship 1 <= SchedulerId <= erlang:system_info(schedulers_online).
trans-unit.target: 返回在线调度程序的数量。在线的调度程序的调度程序标识符满足关系 1 <= SchedulerId <= erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of seconds since midnight up to the specified time.
trans-unit.target: 返回从午夜到指定时间的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of sessions in the cache. If size exceeds the maximum number of sessions, the current cache entries will be invalidated regardless of their remaining lifetime. Is to be callable from any process.
trans-unit.target: 返回缓存中的会话数。如果大小超过了最大的会话数,则当前的缓存条目将被取消,而不考虑其剩余寿命。可以从任何进程调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of start bits, M, of a bitstring_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回起始位，数量 M ，一个的 bitstring_type 节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of subtrees of a data constructor node. This is equivalent to length(data_es(Node)), but potentially more efficient.

trans-unit.target: 返回有向图 G 的顶点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of words in String, separated by blanks or Character.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的单词数，以空格或 Character 分隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeral string represented by a float node.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 float 节点表示的数字字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeral string represented by a floating-point literal node.
Returns the numeral string represented by an integer node.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 integer 节点表示的数字字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeral string represented by an integer literal node.
Returns the object code file extension corresponding to the Erlang machine used, namely .beam.
trans-unit.target: 返回与所使用的Erlang机器相对应的目标代码文件扩展名，即 .beam 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the official name of Host, or {error, Host} if no such name is found. See also inet(3).
trans-unit.target: 返回的正式名称 Host ，或 {error, Host} 如果没有这样的名字中找到。另请参见 inet(3) 。

trans-unit.target: 返回旧的状态标识符,即。

trans-unit.target: 返回prettyprinter上下文的运算符优先域。

trans-unit.source: Returns the operator subtree of a prefix_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 prefix_expr 节点的运算符子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the operator subtree of an application node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 application 节点的运算符子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the operator subtree of an infix_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 infix_expr 节点的运算符子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the operator subtree of an abstract function application.
Returns the pair {node, Node}, describing the chunk continuation returned by chunk/2,3, bchunk/2,3, or chunk_step/3.
trans-unit.target: 返回对 {node, Node} 的对，描述由 chunk/2,3 ， bchunk/2,3 或 chunk_step/3 返回的大块连续性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the paper widh field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: Returns the paper widh field of the prettyprinter context.

trans-unit.source: Returns the path for the "library directory", the top directory, for an application Name located under $OTPROOT/lib or on a directory referred to with environment variable ERL_LIBS.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于 $OTPROOT/lib 或环境变量 ERL_LIBS 引用的目录下的应用程序 Name 的“库目录”（顶层目录）的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to a subdirectory directly under the top directory of an application. Normally the subdirectories reside under the top directory for the application, but when applications at least partly resides in an archive, the situation is different. Some of the subdirectories can reside as regular directories while other reside in an archive file. It is not checked whether this directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回应用程序顶部目录下的子目录的路径。通常子目录位于应用程序的顶层目录下,但当应用程序至少有一部分位于归档文件中时,情况就不同了。有些子目录可以作为常规目录驻留,而有些则驻留在归档文件中。不检查这个目录是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to the priv directory in an application. Equivalent to code:lib_dir(Name, priv).
trans-unit.target: 返回应用程序中 priv 目录的路径。等效于 code:lib_dir(Name, priv) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path to the current key. This is the equivalent of pwd.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前键的路径。这相当于 pwd 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path type, which is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 返回路径类型,路径类型为以下之一。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pattern subtree of a generator node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 generator 节点的模式子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pattern subtree of a match_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 match_expr 节点的模式子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pattern subtree of an abstract pattern alias.
Returns the pid registered under Name, or undefinedif the name is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 Name 下注册的pid；如果未注册名称，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pid with the globally registered name Name. Returns undefined if the name is not globally registered.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有全局注册名称 Name 的pid 。如果名称未全局注册，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pid, port identifier or tracer module of the current system tracer or false if no system tracer is activated.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前系统跟踪程序的pid，端口标识符或跟踪程序模块；如果未激活任何系统跟踪程序，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pointer to the private data that was set by load or upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向由 load 或 upgrade 设置的私有数据的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns the port owner process.
trans-unit.target: 返回端口所有者进程。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position information associated with Node. This is usually a nonnegative integer (indicating the source code line number), but may be any term. By default, all new tree nodes have their associated position information set to the integer zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 Node 关联的位置信息。这通常是一个非负整数（表示源代码行号），但可以是任何术语。默认情况下，所有新树节点的关联位置信息均设置为整数零。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the table key, a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回表键的位置,一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position where the first occurrence of SubString begins in String. Returns 0 if SubString does not exist in String.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一次出现的 SubString 从 String 开始的位置。如果 SubString 在 String 中不存在，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position where the last occurrence of SubString begins in String. Returns 0 if SubString does not exist in String.
trans-unit.target: 返回最后一次出现的 SubString 从 String 开始的位置。如果 SubString 在 String 中不存在，则返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prefix element subtrees of a list node. If Node represents "[E1, ..., En]" or "[E1, ..., En | Tail]", the returned value is [E1, ..., En].
trans-unit.target: 返回 list 节点的前缀元素子树。如果 Node 表示“ [E1, ..., En] ”或“ [E1, ..., En | Tail] ”，则返回值为 [E1, ..., En] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous key Key2, preceding key Key1 according to Erlang term order in table Tab of type ordered_set. For other table types, the function is synonymous to next/2. If no previous key exists, '$end_of_table' is returned.
trans-unit.target: 根据Erlang术语顺序（返回 ordered_set 类型的表 Tab )，返回上一个键 Key2 和上一个键 Key1 。对于其他表类型，该函数与 next/2 是同义词。如果不存在先前的键，则返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous row of the result set relative the current cursor position and positions the cursor at this row.
trans-unit.target: 返回结果集中相对于当前光标位置的前一行,并将光标定位在这一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous system monitor settings just like erlang:system_monitor/0.
Returns the previous system monitor settings just like erlang:system_monitor/0.
trans-unit.target: 返回先前的系统监视器设置，就像 erlang:system_monitor/0 一样。

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous value of the trace token.

trans-unit.source: Returns the printname of an atom node.

trans-unit.source: Returns the printname of an abstract atom.
Returns the process ID associated with a living monitor. It can be used in the process_exit callback to get the process identification for the exiting process.
Returns the process ID associated with a living monitor. It can be used in the process_exit callback to get the process identification for the exiting process.

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Fun to the empty list [] on Node. A link is created between the calling process and the new process, atomically. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned and an exit signal with reason noconnection is sent to the calling process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.

Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Fun to the empty list [] on Node. A link is created between the calling process and the new process, atomically. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned and an exit signal with reason noconnection is sent to the calling process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.
trans-unit.target: 将由 Fun 的应用程序启动的新进程的进程标识符（pid）返回到 Node 上的空列表 [] 。原子地在调用过程和新过程之间创建一个链接。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid，并将原因为 noconnection 的退出信号发送到调用进程。否则像 spawn/3 一样工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Fun to the empty list [] on Node. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned. Otherwise works like spawn_opt/4.
trans-unit.target: 将由 Fun 的应用程序启动的新进程的进程标识符（pid）返回到 Node 上的空列表 [] 。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid。否则像 spawn_opt/4 一样工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Fun to the empty list []. Otherwise works like spawn_opt/4.

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Module:Function to Args on Node. A link is created between the calling process and the new process, atomically. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned and an exit signal with reason noconnection is sent to the calling process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.

Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Module:Function to Args on Node. A link is created between the calling process and the new process, atomically. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned and an exit signal with reason noconnection is sent to the calling process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新进程的进程标识符（PID）开始由应用 Module:Function 到 Args 上 Node 。原子地在调用过程和新过程之间创建一个链接。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid，并将原因为 noconnection 的退出信号发送到调用进程。否则像 spawn/3 一样工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Module:Function to Args on Node. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned. Otherwise works like spawn/3.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新进程的进程标识符（PID）开始由应用 Module:Function 到 Args 上 Node 。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid。否则像 spawn/3 一样工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier (pid) of a new process started by the application of Module:Function to Args on Node. If Node does not exist, a useless pid is returned. Otherwise works like spawn_opt/4.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新进程的进程标识符（PID）开始由应用 Module:Function 到 Args 上 Node 。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid。否则像 spawn_opt/4 一样工作。

trans-unit.target: 将由 Fun 应用程序启动的新流程的流程标识符返回到 Node 上的空列表 [] 。如果 Node 不存在，则返回一个无用的pid。否则像 spawn/3 一样工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of a new process started by the application of Fun to the empty list []. A link is created between the calling process and the new process, atomically. Otherwise works like spawn/3.

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of a new process, started by the application of Fun to the empty list [] on the node Node, and a reference for a monitor created to the new process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.
Returns the process identifier of a new process, started by the application of Fun to the empty list [], and a reference for a monitor created to the new process. Otherwise works like spawn/3.

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of the calling process, for example:
trans-unit.target: 例如,返回调用进程的进程标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of the current Erlang emulator in the format most commonly used by the OS environment. Returns Value as a string containing the (usually) numerical identifier for a process. On Unix, this is typically the return value of the getpid() system call. On Windows, the process id as returned by the GetCurrentProcessId() system call is used.
trans-unit.target: 以OS环境最常用的格式返回当前Erlang仿真器的进程标识符。以字符串的形式返回 Value ，其中包含进程的（通常）数字标识符。在Unix上，这通常是 getpid() 系统调用的返回值。在Windows上，使用由 GetCurrentProcessId() 系统调用返回的进程ID 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process identifier of the group leader for the process evaluating the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回评估函数的过程的组长的过程标识符。

trans-unit.target: 返回发送所有跟踪信息的进程、端口或跟踪模块。

trans-unit.source: Returns the promised answer from a previous async_call/4. If the answer is available, it is returned immediately. Otherwise, the calling process is suspended until the answer arrives from Node.
trans-unit.target: 从先前的 async_call/4 返回承诺的答案。如果答案可用，则立即返回。否则，调用过程将被挂起，直到答案从 Node 到达为止。

trans-unit.source: Returns the protocol negotiated through ALPN or NPN extensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过ALPN或NPN扩展协商的协议。

trans-unit.source: Returns the random number generator state in an external format. To be used with seed/1.
trans-unit.target: 以外部格式返回随机数生成器状态。与 seed/1 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested information items about the connection, if they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了连接,返回所请求的信息项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the resized driver binary on success. Returns NULL on failure (out of memory).
trans-unit.target: 成功返回已调整大小的驱动程序二进制文件。失败时返回 NULL （内存不足）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the latest disk check. Id is a string that identifies the disk or partition. KByte is the total size of the disk or partition in kbytes. Capacity is the percentage of disk space used.
trans-unit.target: 返回最新磁盘检查的结果。 Id 是标识磁盘或分区的字符串。 KByte 是磁盘或分区的总大小，以KB为单位。 Capacity 是已使用磁盘空间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the latest memory check, where Total is the total memory size and Allocated the allocated memory size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回最近一次内存检查的结果，其中 Total 是总内存大小，已 Allocated 的内存大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the results of applying match specification MatchSpec to all or some objects stored in table Name. The order of the objects is not specified. For a description of match specifications, see the ERTS User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 返回将匹配规范 MatchSpec 应用于表 Name 中存储的所有或某些对象的结果。没有指定对象的顺序。有关匹配规范的描述，请参见《 ERTS User's Guide 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the results of applying match specification MatchSpec to some or all objects stored in table Name. The order of the objects is not specified. For a description of match specifications, see the ERTS User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 返回将匹配规范 MatchSpec 应用于表 Name 中存储的某些或所有对象的结果。没有指定对象的顺序。有关匹配规范的描述，请参见《 ERTS User's Guide 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the return type subtrees of a function_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 function_type 节点的返回类型子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the reverse list of the grapheme clusters in String.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 中的字素簇的反向列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the right argument subtree of an infix_expr node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 infix_expr 节点的右参数子树。
